task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店的最低价格是900-1000元的。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个酒店的名称、电话、周边餐馆。
你要去一个餐馆(id=2)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是150-500元的。你希望餐馆的评分是5分。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、推荐菜、电话。
你想乘坐从id=1到id=2的地铁。你想知道这个地铁的出发地附近地铁站、目的地附近地铁站。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我带着妈妈想去酒店住宿。请帮我找一家最低价格是900-1000元，评分是4.5分以上的酒店。
messages.content: Hello, my mother and I want to book a hotel. Could you find a hotel with a minimum price of 900-1000 yuan and a rating of 4.5 points or above for me.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京新世界酒店或者北京贵州大厦住宿。
messages.content: It is recommended that you go to New World Beijing Hotel or Beijing GuiZhou Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 好的。北京贵州大厦的电话是什么啊？
messages.content: Ok. What is the telephone number of Beijing GuiZhou Hotel?
The telephone number is 010-58109988.

messages.ori_content: 恩。这家酒店的附近有什么美味的餐馆吗？
messages.content: Okay. Are there any delicious restaurants near this hotel?

messages.ori_content: 附近餐馆有汉拿山汤泉国际酒店自助餐, 中奥马哥孛罗大酒店马哥孛罗自助餐厅和泰火烤肉等，菜做的都不错。
messages.content: There are Hannashan Hotspring International Hotel Buffet, Marco Polo Parkside Hotel Cafeteria, Taihuo Barbecue, etc. near there. They all make good dishes.
ori_dialog_act: 中奥马哥孛罗大酒店马哥孛罗自助餐厅
汉拿山汤泉国际酒店自助餐

messages.ori_content: 嗯呢。休息好了就去吃饭。帮我推荐一家人均消费是150-500元，评分是5分的餐馆。
messages.content: Ok. We can have a dinnar after a rest. Please recommend me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 150-500 yuan and a rating of 5 points.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去王品牛排(北京亦庄店)吃饭吧，肯定让您满意。
messages.content: I recommend you to Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang), I'm sure you will be satisfied.

messages.ori_content: 太好了。王品牛排(北京亦庄店)的推荐菜给说几个呗。
messages.content: Great. Could you tell me some recommended dishes of Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang).

messages.ori_content: 您可以尝尝它家的酥皮海鲜清汤, 香颂玫瑰露和王品凯撒沙拉，都很不错。
messages.content: You can try its pastry seafood clear soup, chansons rose dew and Wangpin caesar salad. They are all tastey.

messages.ori_content: 好的呢。这家餐馆的电话是多少啊？
messages.content: Okay. What is the telephone number of this restaurant?
The telephone numbers are 67863584 and 67862584.

messages.ori_content: 嗯。从北京贵州大厦到王品牛排(北京亦庄店)乘坐地铁，出发地和目的地附近地铁站分别是啥？
messages.content: Ok. I want to take the subway to Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang) from Beijing GuiZhou Hotel. What are the subway stations near the departure and the destination?

messages.ori_content: 从北京贵州大厦到王品牛排(北京亦庄店)乘坐地铁，出发地附近地铁站是和平西桥地铁站B口，目的地附近地铁站是荣京东街地铁站A1口。
messages.content: To take the subway from Beijing GuiZhou Hotel to Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang), there is a subway station, Heping West Bridge Subway Station Exit B, near the departure, and a subway station, Rongjing Dongjie Subway Station Exit a1, near the destination.
dialog_act: Heping West Bridge Subway Station Exit B
Rongjing Dongjie Subway Station Exit a1

messages.ori_content: 嗯嗯，谢谢啊。
messages.content: Ok, Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气哦。
messages.content: You are welcome.

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是150-500元的。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、地址、营业时间。
你要去名叫中山公园的景点(id=2)游玩。你想知道这个景点的评分、门票。
你要去一个酒店(id=3)住宿。你希望酒店提供会议室。你想知道这个酒店的名称、电话、周边景点。
你要去id=3附近的景点(id=4)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你希望游玩的时长是0.3小时 - 0.5小时。你希望景点的票价是免费的。你想知道这个景点的电话、周边景点。

messages.ori_content: 亲，在不，我周末想请朋友吃饭，你可以帮我介绍一下哪家的餐馆是人均消费在150-500元的，评分是4.5分以上的吗？
messages.content: Hello！I want to invite my friends to dinner at weekends. Can you tell me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 150-500 yuan and a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 可以啊，你们可以去莫斯科餐厅试试，这里就很适合请客吃饭。
messages.content: Yes, you can go to Moscow Restaurants to try, this is very suitable for dinner.

messages.ori_content: 你知道他家的营业时间是到几点吗？顺便把地址发给我呗。
messages.content: Do you know its opening hours? By the way, send me the address.

messages.ori_content: 可以，他家的营业时间是周一至周日 11:00-14:00 17:00-21:00，地址为：西直门外大街135号北京展览馆西侧门。
messages.content: Yes, it opens at Monday to Sunday 11: 00-14: 00 17: 00-21: 00, and the address is West Gate of Beijing Exhibition Center, No.135, Xizhimen Outer Street.
ori_dialog_act: 西直门外大街135号北京展览馆西侧门
dialog_act: West Gate of Beijing Exhibition Center, No.135, Xizhimen Outer Street

messages.ori_content: 好的，我都记下来了，吃过饭，接下来我想和朋友出去走走，你知道中山公园的门票价格和景点的评分吗？
messages.content: Ok, I have noted it down. I want to go out for a walk with my friends after dinner. Do you know the tiket price and the rating of Zhongshan Park?

messages.ori_content: 这个景点我太熟悉了，就在我家附近，他的评分是4.1分，门票价格是3元。
messages.content: The attraction is so familiar to me. It's just near my home. Its rating is 4.1 points, and the ticket price is 3 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 哈哈，这个地方太适合散步去了，接下来我们玩累了，想找一个提供会议室服务的酒店休息，你知道哪家适合我们去吗？
messages.content: Haha, this place is so suitable for a walk. Then we want to find a hotel that offers meeting room service for rest after playing. Do you know which one is suitable for us?

messages.ori_content: 你们去北京燕山大酒店就行。
messages.content: You can choose Beijing Yanshan Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 他家电话是多少啊，你发给我吧。
messages.content: What's the telephone number? Please send it to me.
Yes, the telephone number is 010-62563388.

messages.ori_content: 在看一下这个酒店的周边有没有别人可以玩的景点呢？
messages.content: Could you please check whether there is any attraction that others can play around this hotel?

messages.ori_content: 酒店的周边还有两处景点，是颐和园, 昆明湖，你们也可以走走的。
messages.content: There are another two attractions around the hotel, the Summer Palace and the Kunming Lake. You can also go there.

messages.ori_content: 哈哈，那你就帮我看一下这两个景点哪个是评分在4.5分以上，可以玩0.3小时 - 0.5小时的免费景点啊？
messages.content: Haha, could you tell me which of these two attractions is free with a playing duration of 0.3 hours-0.5 hours and has a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 两个景点严格来说都不符合你的要求，不过昆明湖是可以游玩1个小时的，其他条件都符合你的要求，你们去这里玩，可以吗？
messages.content: Strictly speaking, both attractions do not meet your requirements, but the Kunming Lake can meet all your requirements except for its playing duration of 1 hour. Is it ok?

messages.ori_content: 好啊，也是闲玩，把这里的电话发给我吧。
messages.content: Okay, it's just for fun. Send me the telephone number of it.
Ok, the telephone number is 010-62881144.

messages.ori_content: 好的，这个昆明湖的附近还有什么景点吗？
messages.content: Okay, are there any attractions near this Kunming Lake?

messages.ori_content: 还真有几个，颐和园, 圆明园, 北京大学, 清华大学。
messages.content: There are just a few attractions, the Summer palace, the Old Summer Palace, Peking University and Tsinghua University.

messages.ori_content: 行，太感谢你了，帮我解答这么多的问题。
messages.content: Yes, thank you so much for helping me answer so many questions.

messages.ori_content: 不客气，祝你们玩的开心！
messages.content: You're welcome, I wish you a lot of fun!

messages.ori_content: 对不起没有查到酒店的价格信息，您还有其他问题吗？

messages.ori_content: 我打算去名叫奶酪魏（牛街总店）的餐馆用餐，能帮我查一下这个餐馆的电话吗？

Of course, the telephone number is 010-63522402.

messages.ori_content: 好的，我记下了，这个餐馆都有什么推荐菜呀？

messages.ori_content: 推荐菜有奶油炸糕, 杏仁豆腐。

messages.ori_content: 收到，我喜欢这些菜，谢谢你呀！

messages.ori_content: 不用客气！

你要去id=3附近的餐馆(id=4)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是胡同菜。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你想知道这个餐馆的电话。

messages.content: Hello, I want shortening jujube cake, could you recommend me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 很高兴可以帮助您！为您找到两家餐馆:北京稻香村(六里桥店)和北京稻香村(兴禾店)。
messages.content: Glad to help you! I found two restaurants for you: Beijing Daoxiangcun (Liuliqiao) and Beijing Daoxiangcun (Xinghe).

messages.ori_content: 我想找个评分4.5分以上的，这两家店有合适的吗？
messages.content: I'd like to find one with a rating of 4.5 points or above. Does these two stores meet my requirement?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，没有这样的餐馆。北京稻香村(兴禾店)还不错，评分是4分。
messages.content: Sorry, there is no such a restaurant. Beijing Daoxiangcun (Xinghe) is great, but it has a rating of 4 points.

messages.ori_content: 那还好，北京稻香村(兴禾店)周边有啥酒店吗？
messages.content: That's ok. Are there any hotels around Daoxiangcun (Xinghe)?

messages.ori_content: 北京稻香村(兴禾店)周边的酒店有北京梧桐树酒店和北京瑞斯汀主题酒店。
messages.content: The hotels around Daoxiangcun (Xinghe) include Phoenix Tree Hotel and Beijing Ruisiting Theme Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 北京稻香村(兴禾店)周边的酒店里有没有最低价格是800-900元的高档型酒店呢？
messages.content: Are there any high-end hotels around Daoxiangcun (Xinghe) with a minimum price of 800-900 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 对不起，周边没有合适的酒店。北京瑞斯汀主题酒店怎么样呢？酒店是舒适型酒店，价格是336元。
messages.content: Sorry, there is no such hotels around. What about Beijing Ruisiting Theme Hotel? It is a comfort hotel, with a price of 336 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 也还行，那酒店周边有什么可以游玩的景点吗？
messages.content: Okay, are there any attractions around the hotel that I can play?

messages.ori_content: 您可以去中国影视大乐园、 中国印刷博物馆、 念坛公园游玩。
messages.content: You can go to the China Film Park, the China Printing Museum and the Niantan Park.

messages.ori_content: 给您推荐北京京仪大酒店和北京饭店。

ori_dialog_act: 锦江之星(北京首都国际机场店)

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢！

messages.ori_content: 景点的评分是4分。
messages.content: The rating of it is 4 points.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢了。
messages.content: Ok, thanks.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想带女朋友去一个评分4.5分以上门票20元以下的，可以游玩时间长2小时的景点游玩，给我推荐一个吧。

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去景山公园游玩。
messages.content: I recommend you Jingshan Park.

messages.ori_content: 这个景点的周边有哪些酒店啊？
messages.content: Is there any hotel around this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 周边的酒店有北京天伦王朝酒店, 北京饭店。
messages.content: There are hotels near it including Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing and Beijing Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 请在景山公园周边的酒店里给我推荐一个评分4.5分以上，最低价格在1000元以上的酒店住宿。
messages.content: Please recommend me a hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above among hotels around Jingshan Park, I hope the lowest price is 1000 yuan or above.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京首都宾馆住宿。
messages.content: I recommend you Capital Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 这家酒店的周边有哪些餐馆啊？
messages.content: Is there any restaurant around this hotel?

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）, 北京全聚德(王府井店)。
messages.content: There are restaurants near it including Huguosi Snack (headquater) and Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 好的，我想找个评分4.5分以上的高档型酒店住宿，给我推荐一家吧。
messages.content: Okay, I want to find a high-end hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above. Please recommend me one.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京京仪大酒店住宿。
messages.content: I recommend you Beijing Jingyi Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 这个酒店的电话是多少啊？
messages.content: What is the telephone number of this hotel?
The telephone number is 010-62165588.

messages.ori_content: 酒店的周边有哪些景点啊？
messages.content: Is there any attraction around the hotel?

messages.ori_content: 周边的景点有清华大学, 北京大学。
messages.content: There are attractions around it including Tsinghua University and Peking University.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢你了啊。
messages.content: Okay, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a hotel with a minimum price of 1000 yuan or above? I hope the hotel has a rating of 4 points or above. My husband and I want to play.

messages.ori_content: 推荐你们去北京都季商旅酒店或北京丽晶酒店，都是环境相当不错的酒店了。
messages.content: I recommend you Citytel Inn or Regent Hotel Beijing. They both have good environment.

messages.content: What is the telephone number of Regent Hotel Beijing? If I have any questions, I can directly consult it.
Please take it down: 010-85221888.

messages.ori_content: 好的，那这个酒店的就近有啥景点吗，休息好了想去转转。
messages.content: Okay. Are there any attractions near this hotel? I want to visit them after a good rest.

messages.ori_content: 周边景点有雍和宫, 今日美术馆, 地坛, 三里屯酒吧街, 蜂巢剧场等。
messages.content: There are Lama Temple, Today Art Museum, Di Tan, Sanlitun Bar Street, Beehive Theatre, etc. around it.

messages.ori_content: 太好了，麻烦你再帮我们找个人均消费是100-150元的餐馆，我俩尝尝美味。
messages.content: Great. Could you recommend us a restaurant with a per-person cost of 100-150 yuan? We want to enjoy delicious food.

messages.ori_content: 建议你们去四季民福烤鸭店（灯市口店）或砂锅居（西四店）。
messages.content: I recommend you Siji Minfu Roast Duck Restaurant (Dengshikou) or Sha Kou Ju (Xisi).
ori_dialog_act: 四季民福烤鸭店（灯市口店）

messages.ori_content: 砂锅居（西四店）觉得很不错的，这个餐馆的附近有啥可以玩的景点吗？
messages.content: Sha Kou Ju (Xisi) is very nice. Are there any attractions near this restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 周边景点有故宫, 恭王府, 天安门广场, 前门大街。
messages.content: There are the Forbidden City, Prince Kung's Mansion, the Tiananmen Square and Qianmen Street in the neighborhood.

messages.ori_content: 不错不错，那这个餐馆的附近还有别的美味吗，出来玩就得吃好了。
messages.content: Great. Are there any other delicious food near this restaurant? I want to eat well when I play.

messages.ori_content: 有两家是护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）, 北京全聚德(王府井店)。
messages.content: They are two restaurants, Huguosi Snack (headquater) and Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 嗯嗯，那在砂锅居（西四店）周边景点中哪个的票价是20元以下，游玩的时长是2小时。
messages.content: Well. Which of the attractions around Sha Kou Ju (Xisi) has a fee of 20 yuan or less and a playing duration of 2 hours?

messages.ori_content: 只有前门大街这个景点符合您的要求，它的票价是免费的，游玩时长是1小时 - 2小时。
messages.content: Only Qianmen Street meets your requirements. Its fee is free and the playing duration is 1 hour-2 hours.

messages.ori_content: 好的，那这个景点的电话是多少，方便给我们吗，万一想起问题咨询一下。
messages.content: Okay. What is the telephone number of this attraction? Is it convenient for you to give us the telephone number? I can consult the attraction when I have questions.
Please take it down. The telephone number is 010-67060009.

messages.ori_content: 记好了，这个景点有周边酒店吗，玩累了想去休息。
messages.content: I've taken it down. Are there any hotels around this attraction? I want to take a rest when I'm tired.

messages.ori_content: 有的呢，是北京首都宾馆, 北京天伦王朝酒店, 北京贵都大酒店。
messages.content: Yes, there are. There are Capital Hotel Beijing, Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing and Guidu Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 非常好，那在砂锅居（西四店）附近的餐馆中哪个的评分是4.5分以上，人均消费是50-100元。
messages.content: Great. Which of the restaurants near Sha Kou Ju (Xisi) has a rating of 4.5 points or above and a per-person cost of  50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 推荐你们去护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店），但是它的评分是4.3分，人均消费是23元。
messages.content: I recommend you Huguosi Snack (headquater). But its rating is 4.3 points and the per-person cost is 23 yuan.
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 非常好，那这个餐馆的电话是多少，万一有想吃的可以打电话问问。
messages.content: Well. What is the telephone number of this restaurant? I can call it when I want something to eat.
Please take it down. The telephone number is 010-66181705.

messages.ori_content: 记好了，这个餐馆的附近还有其它的餐馆吗，我老公想换换口味。
messages.content: I've taken it down. Are there any other restaurants near this restaurant? My husband wants to have something for a change.

messages.ori_content: 有的呢，是鬼味烤翅，天兴居，咂摸，酒吧等等。
messages.content: Yes, there are. There are Guiwei Grilled Wings, Tianxingju Restaurant, ZaMo, Bar, etc. around it.

messages.ori_content: 嗯嗯，听朋友说角楼很好玩的，你知道这个景点的电话吗？
messages.content: Um. My friends say Turret is fun. Do you know the telephone number of this attraction?
The telephone number that I'm sure is 010-85007421.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，那这个景点的游玩时长是多久啊，时间太久的话我体力跟不上，我老公还是挺能走的。
messages.content: Well. How long can I play at this attraction? If it is too long, I don't have so much energy. My husband can walk a lot.

messages.ori_content: 游玩时长很短的是0.2小时 - 0.3小时。
messages.content: The playing duration is very short, 0.2 hours-0.3 hours.

messages.ori_content: 好的，真的是太谢谢你了。
messages.content: Okay. Thank you so much.

messages.ori_content: 不客气的，很高兴能帮到您。
messages.content: You're welcome. I'm glad to help you.

messages.ori_content: 簋街小吃周边的餐馆有北新桥卤煮老店、铃木食堂(小菊儿胡同店)、姚记炒肝店（鼓楼店），周边酒店有北京天伦王朝酒店、北京鹏润国际大酒店、北京都季商旅酒店。
messages.content: There are restaurants, such as Beixin Bridge Stewed Pork Offal Restaurant, Suzuki Cafeteria (Xiaojuer Hutong) and Yao Ji Fried Liver Restaurant (Gulou) in the neighborhood and there are hotels, such as Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing, Grand Concordia Hotel Beijing and Citytel Inn around it.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去白兔餐厅(黄村店)。
messages.content: I recommend you White Rabbit Restaurant (Huangcun).

messages.content: The address of White Rabbit Restaurant (Huangcun) is Ground Shop of Rainbow New Town, Liyuan Road, Huangcun Town (East Side of Wumart Supermarket). There are Phoenix Tree Hotel and Beijing Ruisiting Theme Hotel around it.
ori_dialog_act: 黄村镇丽园路彩虹新城底商(物美超市东侧)
dialog_act: Ground Shop  of Rainbow New Town, Liyuan Road, Huangcun Town (East Side of Wumart Supermarket)

messages.ori_content: 在这些周边酒店中，有能接待外宾的酒店吗，价格怎么样？

messages.ori_content: 周边酒店中没有能接待外宾的，推荐您去北京梧桐树酒店吧，价格250元。
messages.content: There is no hotel with foreign guests reception in the surrounding hotels. I recommend you Phoenix Tree Hotel with a price of 250 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 谢谢你。
messages.content: Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.ori_content: 此店营业时间是周一至周日 07:00-09:00 11:30-13:00 17:30-19:30，然后推荐菜有甜点, 萝卜汤, 小炒黄牛肉, 蟹黄豆腐, 烧海参, 蒜茸粉丝扇贝, 水饺, 东坡肉, 自制酸奶, 大虾。
messages.content: Its opening hours are Monday to Sunday 07: 00-09: 00 11: 30-13: 00 17: 30-19: 30. And the recommended dishes are dessert, radish soup, sautéed bos taurus beef, crab tofu, braised sea cucumber, scallops steamed with garlic and vermicelli, boiled dumpling, Dongpo pork, home-made yogurt and shrimp.

messages.ori_content: 然后我要找个评分在4.5分以上、游玩时间在4小时 - 6小时的景点游玩，你看有什么好推荐，顺便把推荐的景点电话给我。

messages.ori_content: 那我推荐您去北京野生动物园，它的电话是010-62013366。
messages.content: I recommend you Beijing Wildlife Park. Its telephone number is 010-62013366.

messages.ori_content: 好，帮我叫下车，我要从远望楼宾馆餐厅打出租到北京野生动物园，麻烦把车型与车牌发给我。
messages.content: OK. Could you help me call a taxi? I'll take a taxi from Yuanwanglou Hotel Restaurant to Beijing Wildlife Park. Please give me the car type and the plate number.

messages.ori_content: 车型是#CX，然后车牌#CP。
messages.content: The car type is #CX and the plate number is #CP.

messages.ori_content: 谢谢，我没问题了。
messages.content: Thanks. I have no more questions.

messages.ori_content: 好，不客气。
messages.content: Okay. You're welcome.

messages.content: There are many choices. I recommend one, ShenggaoHotelBeijing (Caoqiao Metro Station). You can go there.
ori_dialog_act: 胜高连锁酒店(北京草桥店)

messages.ori_content: 哦，那你知道他家的地址吗？
messages.content: Oh. Do you know its address?

messages.ori_content: 当然了，地址是北京丰台区草桥欣园四区一号楼首层。
messages.content: Of course. The address is 1st Floor, Building 1, Caoqiaoxinyuan Siqu, Fengtai District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京丰台区草桥欣园四区一号楼首层
dialog_act: 1st Floor, Building 1, Caoqiaoxinyuan Siqu, Fengtai District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 太好了，我记一下，那这个酒店的周边有什么景点可以去吗？
messages.content: Great. Let me take it down. Are there any attractions around this hotel?

messages.ori_content: 周边无景点！
messages.content: There is no attraction around it!

messages.ori_content: 还打算在酒店的周边找一处可以玩0.5小时，票价是150-200元的景点玩玩呢。
messages.content: I also plan to find an attraction around the hotel with a playing duration of 0.5 hours and a fee of 150-200 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 那你看我给你推荐一个景点，世界公园亚洲区怎么样，这里的门枉法裁判是100元的，只是位置离酒店远一些，行吗？
messages.content: I recommend you an attraction. How about World Park Asian Region? The fee is 100 yuan, but it is far away from the hotel. Is it OK?

messages.ori_content: 也可以，反正也是旅游，走远些也所反谓的，你看看这个景点的周边有没有餐馆呢？
messages.content: It's okay. Ayway, I go out to play, and going a little further is also OK. Are there any restaurants around this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 放心吧，有吃饭的地方，哈哈，周边餐馆有南沙渔港(乐家店), 宜家瑞典食品屋, 西国贸大酒店。
messages.content: Don't worry. There are restaurants, haha, and there are Nansha Fishing Port (Lejia), IKEA Swedish Food House and West International Trade Grand Hotel.

messages.ori_content: 哦，你太了解我了，是的，不用担心吃饭的问题了，在看一下这个景点的附近还有别的景点吗？
messages.content: Oh. You know me too well. Well, I don't need to worry about eating. Are there any other attractions near this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 有啊，周边的景点有北京汽车博物馆, 紫谷伊甸园, 世界公园, 世界公园美洲区，有时间你可以在去转转的。
messages.content: Yes. There are Beijing Automobile Museum, Purple Valley Eden, World Park and World Park Americas District. You can go there if time permits.

messages.ori_content: 哈哈，我太开心了，谢谢你的介绍哈！
messages.content: Haha. I'm so happy. Thank you for your introduction!

messages.ori_content: 祝你旅行愉快！
messages.content: Have a nice trip!

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店是经济型的。你希望酒店提供行李寄存。你想知道这个酒店的名称、地址。
你要去一个餐馆(id=2)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是柴鸡炖蘑菇。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、周边餐馆、电话。
你想乘坐从id=1到id=2的地铁。你想知道这个地铁的出发地附近地铁站、目的地附近地铁站。

messages.ori_content: 你好，帮我找个经济型可以提供行李寄存的酒店，我要去北京出差。
messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a budget hotel that can provide luggage storage? I am going to Beijing for a business trip.

messages.ori_content: 建议您去锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)或金广快捷酒店(北京首都机场新国展店)。
messages.content: I recommend you Jinjiang Inn (Beijing Olympic Sports Center) or Jinguang Express Hotel (Beijing Capital Airport New International Exhibition Center).
ori_dialog_act: 金广快捷酒店(北京首都机场新国展店)
锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)
dialog_act: Jinguang Express Hotel (Beijing Capital Airport New International Exhibition Center)

messages.ori_content: 锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)的地址是在哪里，我查下路线。
messages.content: Where is Jinjiang Inn (Beijing Olympic Sports Center)? I inquire about the route.
ori_dialog_act: 锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)

messages.ori_content: 地址是北京朝阳区安定门外安苑里1号院。
messages.content: The address is Yard 1, Anyuanli, outside Andingmen, Chaoyang District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京朝阳区安定门外安苑里1号院
dialog_act: Yard 1, Anyuanli, outside Andingmen, Chaoyang District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 嗯，据说北京的柴鸡炖蘑菇很好吃的，麻烦你帮我找个有这个菜的餐馆。
messages.content: Well. It is said that the stewed domestic chicken with mushroom in Beijing is delicious. Could you recommend me a restaurant with this dish?

messages.ori_content: 为您找到两家餐馆是九龙池农家乐和鑫方圆饭店。
messages.content: I recommend you two restaurants, Jiulongchi Farmhouse and Xinfangyuan Restaurant.

messages.ori_content: 鑫方圆饭店的附近还有别的特色餐馆吗，正好可以换换口味。
messages.content: Are there any other specialty restaurants near Xinfangyuan Restaurant? I can try it for a change.

messages.ori_content: 很抱歉，周边没有餐馆。
messages.content: Sorry. There is no restaurant around it.

messages.ori_content: 没关系的，这个餐馆的电话是多少，万一我想起特别想吃的就打电话咨询下。
messages.content: It doesn't matter. What is the telephone number of this restaurant? When I think of something I want to eat, I can call and consult.

messages.ori_content: 电话只有一个是69662218。
messages.content: There is only one telephone number: 69662218.

messages.ori_content: 记好了，从锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)到鑫方圆饭店乘坐地铁的话，出发地和目的地附近的地铁站分别是什么？
messages.content: I've taken it down. I want to take the subway from Jinjiang Inn (Beijing Olympic Sports Center) to Xinfangyuan Restaurant. What are the subway stations near the departure and destination?
ori_dialog_act: 锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)

messages.ori_content: 出发地附近的地铁站是安贞门地铁站A口，目的地的附近的地铁站没有查到。
messages.content: The subway station near the departure is Exit a of Anzhenmen Subway Station. The subway station near the destination is not found.
dialog_act: Exit a of Anzhenmen Subway Station

messages.ori_content: 清楚了，谢谢你了。
messages.content: I got it. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 很开心帮助到您。
messages.content: I'm glad to help you.

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店提供会议室。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个酒店的名称、周边餐馆、价格。
你要去一个餐馆(id=2)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、电话。
你要去名叫故宫的景点(id=3)游玩。你想知道这个景点的游玩时间、门票。
你想乘坐从id=2到id=3的地铁。你想知道这个地铁的出发地附近地铁站、目的地附近地铁站。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想找一个提供会议室，评分是4.5分以上的酒店住宿，哪家比较符合条件？
messages.content: Hello. I want to find a hotel that can provide a meeting room with a rating of 4.5 points or above. Which one is better?

messages.ori_content: 北京康莱德酒店和北京昆泰嘉华酒店都很符合这个要求。
messages.content: Conrad Beijing and Beijing Kuntai Royal Hotel meet this requirement.

messages.ori_content: 就去北京康莱德酒店吧，它家周边有餐馆吗？
messages.content: I'll go to Conrad Beijing. Are there any restaurants around it?

messages.ori_content: 有啊，大渔铁板烧(蓝色港湾店), VitaLand亲子餐厅都是它周边的。
messages.content: Yes. There are Tairyo (Blue Harbor) and Vitaland Family Restaurants around it.
ori_dialog_act: 大渔铁板烧(蓝色港湾店)

messages.ori_content: 好的，酒店价格你知道吗？
messages.content: Okay. Do you know the hotel price?

messages.ori_content: 价格是1691元。
messages.content: The price is 1691 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 哦，消费还挺高呢，住下以后我打算去用餐，有没有人均消费是50-100元，评分是4.5分以上的餐馆帮忙推荐一个呗。
messages.content: Oh. The cost is quite high. I plan to have a meal after living in the hotel. Could you recommend me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 50-100 yuan and a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 好多呢，眉州东坡(雁栖店)，千岛炭火烤肉，焱聚鹏餐厅都是我吃过的比较不错的餐馆。
messages.content: There are so many restaurants. Meizhou Dongpo (Yanqi), Qiandao Barbecue and Yanjupeng Restaurant are all nice restaurants where I have been.

messages.ori_content: 想吃烤肉了，千岛炭火烤肉的电话发给我一下。
messages.content: I want to have barbecue. Could you give me the telephone number of Qiandao Barbecue?
Please take it down: 56171999.

messages.ori_content: 好的记好了，用过餐我想去名叫故宫的景点游玩，你知道这个景点的游玩时间吗？
messages.content: Okay. I've taken it down. After dinner, I want to go to the Forbidden City. Do you know the playing duration of this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 游玩时间是12小时 - 3天。
messages.content: The playing duration is 12 hours-3 days.

messages.ori_content: 这时间有点长啊，这里门票是多少啊？
messages.content: It is a little long. How much is the fee here?

messages.ori_content: 门票还行60元。
messages.content: The fee is 60 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 那还不贵，我想乘地铁从千岛炭火烤肉到故宫，你知道出发地和目的地附近都有什么地铁站吗？
messages.content: That's not expensive. I want to take the subway from Qiandao Barbecue to the Forbidden City. What are the subway stations near the departure and destination?

messages.ori_content: 起点附近地铁站是回龙观东大街地铁站B口，终点附近地铁站是灯市口地铁站A口。
messages.content: The subway station near the departure is Exit b of Huilongguan East Street Subway Station, and the subway station near the destination is Dengshikou Subway Station Exit A.
ori_dialog_act: 回龙观东大街地铁站B口
dialog_act: Exit b of Huilongguan East Street Subway Station

messages.ori_content: 收到，谢谢！
messages.content: I got it. Thank you!

messages.ori_content: 不客气，举手之劳。
messages.content: You're welcome. It's no bother

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想吃的菜肴是凉拌拉皮。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、周边景点、电话。

messages.content: Hello! I want tossed mung clear noodles in sauce. Could you recommend a restaurant with a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 您好，没有查到适合的餐馆。
messages.content: Hello. I didn't find any suitable restaurants.

messages.ori_content: 那有哪家餐馆有凉拌拉皮这道菜的吗？
messages.content: Does any restaurant provide tossed mung clear noodles in sauce?
dialog_act: Tossed mung clear noodles in sauce

messages.ori_content: 盛隆园有您想吃的这道菜。
messages.content: Shenglongyuan provides it.

messages.ori_content: 那这家餐馆评分是多少呀，周边有什么景点吗？
messages.content: What's the rating of this restaurant? Are there any attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 餐馆的评分是3.5分，周边的景点有中央美术学院美术馆，798艺术区，尤伦斯当代艺术中心, 中国工艺美术馆。
messages.content: The rating is 3.5 points, and the attractions near it are CAFA Art Museum, 798 Art District, Ullens Center for Contemporary Art and China National Arts.

messages.ori_content: 评分虽说低了点，不过周边的景点我还是挺感兴趣的，充满了艺术气息。餐馆的电话是多少？
messages.content: Although the rating is low, I am still very interested in its surrounding attractions, which are full of art. What's the telephone number of the restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 餐馆的电话是57106376。
messages.content: The telephone number is 57106376.

messages.ori_content: 明天下午我想去一个评分是4.5分以上的免费景点玩，请帮我推荐一个游玩时长是1小时 - 2小时的景点！
messages.content: Tomorrow afternoon, I'd like to visit a ticket-free attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above and a playing duration of 1 hour-2 hours. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您到老舍茶馆看看。
messages.content: I recommend you Lao She Tea House.

messages.ori_content: 老舍茶馆的周边有哪些餐馆和酒店呢？
messages.content: What restaurants and hotels are around it?

messages.ori_content: 茶馆周边的餐馆有北京全聚德(王府井店)，护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店），周边的酒店有北京首都宾馆，北京贵都大酒店，北京天伦王朝酒店。
messages.content: The restaurants around it are Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing) and Huguosi Snack (Headquater), and the hotels near it are Capital Hotel Beijing, Guidu Hotel Beijing and Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing.
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢！
messages.content: Okay. Thank you!

messages.ori_content: 不客气！
messages.content: You're welcome!

messages.ori_content: 酒店的周边有哪些餐馆啊，酒店价格多少啊？

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有北京全聚德, 东来顺(前门大街店)。价格是1354元。
messages.content: The restaurants near it are Beijing Quanjude and Donglaishun (Qianmen Street). The hotel price is 1354 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 我想去一家评分5分有梭边鱼这道菜的餐馆吃饭，给我推荐一家餐馆用餐吧。
messages.content: I want letalurus punetaus at a restaurant with a rating of 5 points. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去新辣道鱼火锅(北京惠新店)用餐。
messages.content: I recommend you Xinladao Fish Hot Pot (Beijing Huixin).

messages.ori_content: 这家餐馆的地址是在哪，人均消费多少钱啊？

messages.ori_content: 地址是在惠新东街9号，人均消费是93元。
messages.content: The address is No. 9, Huixin East Street, and the per-person cost is 93 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 吃完饭我想找一家评分4.5分以上的门票价格20-50元的景点游玩，给我推荐一个好玩的景点吧。

messages.ori_content: 景点的周边有哪些餐馆啊?

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有赛百味, 肯德基(八达岭步行街店)。
messages.content: The restaurants near it are Subway and KFC (Badaling Pedestrian Street).
ori_dialog_act: 肯德基(八达岭步行街店)

messages.ori_content: 景点的周边有哪些酒店啊？
messages.content: What hotels are around the attraction?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉周边没有酒店。
messages.content: Sorry. There are no hotels near it.

messages.ori_content: 请在八达岭长城周边的餐馆给我推荐一家评分4.5分以上人均消费价格100-150元的餐馆吃饭。

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢你了啊。
messages.content: Okay. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，完事我要去一个景点游玩，您帮我找个游玩时长在0.3小时 - 0.5小时，然后票价50-100元的地方。
messages.content: Well. I'll go to an attraction after dinner. Could you recommend me a place where the playing duration is 0.3 hours-0.5 hours, and the fee is 50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 您的游玩时间太短，查询后没有符合您这个时间的景点，相对世界公园美洲区0.5小时 - 1小时的游玩时间算是最贴近您的要求，等它的门票收费标准符合您的要求。
messages.content: The playing duration is too short, so no attraction matches it. Relatively, World Park Americas District with a playing duration of 0.5 hours-1 hour is close to the time requirements most. And its ticket fee could satisfy you.

messages.ori_content: 行，这个点也可以，那它周边都有什么餐馆呢。
messages.content: This attraction is also ok. Then what restaurants are around it?

messages.ori_content: 它周边餐馆有宜家瑞典食品屋、南沙渔港(乐家店)、西国贸大酒店。
messages.content: The restaurants near it are IKEA Swedish Food House, Nansha Fishing Port (Lejia) and West International Trade Grand Hotel.

messages.content: After playing at the attraction, I need a hotel. I hope its rating is 4 points or above, and the the price is 900-1000 yuan. Any good recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 满足您这两样要求的酒店有很多，我给您推荐几个，然后您从中挑个，北京远通维景国际大酒店、北京世纪金源大饭店、北京中国职工之家饭店、北京国宾酒店、北京贵州大厦。
messages.content: There are many hotels meeting these two requirements. I recommend some for your choosing: Beijing Grand Metropark Yuantong Hotel, Empark Grand Hotel Beijing, China Palace Hotel, the Presidential Hotel Beijing and Beijing GuiZhou Hotel.

北京远通维景国际大酒店

messages.ori_content: 还是您给我挑一个吧，里面要有残疾人设施。

messages.ori_content: 好，那我推荐您北京远通维景国际大酒店，它满足您所有需求。
messages.content: Well. Then I recommend you Beijing Grand Metropark Yuantong Hotel. It meets all your needs.
ori_dialog_act: 北京远通维景国际大酒店

messages.ori_content: 行，那您把这个酒店的地址给我一下。
messages.content: Ok. Then could you give me the address?.

messages.content: The address is No. 30, Ping'anli West Street, Xicheng District, Beijing.

dialog_act: No. 30, Ping'anli West Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 对了，它周边都有什么景点呢。
messages.content: By the way, what are the attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 它周边景点有北京外国语大学。
messages.content: Beijing Foreign Studies University is near it.

messages.ori_content: 哦，那我想在北京远通维景国际大酒店附近找个能游玩3天的地方，你看看有哪个景点符合我呀。

messages.ori_content: 在此酒店附近没有能供您游玩三天的景点，不过其它地方有，像故宫、798艺术区、北京欢乐谷、爨底下、石景山游乐园都可供您游玩三天时间。

messages.ori_content: 好，我没有问题了，谢谢您的查询。

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.ori_content: 给我推荐一个门票在50-100元，游玩时间在1小时 - 2小时的景点。
messages.content: Could you recommend me an attraction with a ticket fee of 50-100 yuan and a playing duration of 1 hour-2 hours?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去尤伦斯当代艺术中心。
messages.content: I recommend you Ullens Center for Contemporary Art.

messages.ori_content: 尤伦斯当代艺术中心周边有酒店吗，周边有哪些景点可以玩？
messages.content: Are there hotels or attractions around Ullens Center for Contemporary Art?

messages.ori_content: 尤伦斯当代艺术中心周边的酒店有北京东煌凯丽酒店、北京方恒假日酒店、北京丽都维景酒店，周边的景点有798艺术区、白盒子艺术馆、观复博物馆。
messages.content: Hotels near it are Donghuang Kaili Hotel Beijing, Holiday Inn Beijing Focus Square and Metropark Lido Hotel Beijing. And the attractions near it are 798 Art District, White Box Art Center and Guanfu Museum.

messages.ori_content: 给我推荐一个人均消费50-100元的餐馆。
messages.content: Could you recommend me a restaurant with a per-person of 50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去聚宝源(牛街总店)。
messages.content: I recommend you Jubaoyuan Shabu Meat (Niujie headquater).

messages.ori_content: 聚宝源(牛街总店)地址在哪？
messages.content: Where is Jubaoyuan Shabu Meat (Niujie headquater)?

messages.ori_content: 聚宝源(牛街总店)地址在北京市西城区牛街西里商业1号楼5-2号(清真超市旁)。
messages.content: It is at No. 5-2, Building 1, Niujie Xili Commercial Area, Xicheng District, Beijing (next to the Halal Supermarket).
ori_dialog_act: 北京市西城区牛街西里商业1号楼5-2号(清真超市旁)
dialog_act: No. 5-2, Building 1, Niujie Xili Commercial Area, Xicheng District, Beijing (next to the Halal Supermarket)

messages.ori_content: 谢谢了。
messages.content: Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是三鲜包子。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、营业时间。
你要去一个酒店(id=2)住宿。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你希望酒店是经济型的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、酒店设施是否包含会议室、周边餐馆。
你想呼叫从id=1到id=2的出租车。你想知道这个出租的车型、车牌。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想吃三鲜包子了，能帮我推荐一家评分在4.5分以上的餐馆吗？
messages.content: Hello. I'm hungry for steamed bun stuffed with three fresh delicacies. Could you recommend me a restaurant with a rating of 4.5 points or above?
dialog_act: Steamed bun stuffed with three fresh delicacies

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐天兴居。
messages.content: I recommend Tianxingju Restaurant to you.

messages.ori_content: 天兴居的营业时间是几点到几点啊？
messages.content: What are the opening hours of it?

messages.ori_content: 营业时间是周一至周日 06:30-21:30。
messages.content: The opening hours are Monday to Sunday 06:30-21:30.

messages.ori_content: 好的，吃完饭我想找一个评分在4.5分以上的经济型酒店，帮我推荐一下。
messages.content: Okay. After meal, I need a budget hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)。
messages.content: I recommend Home Inn (Beijing Yansha Embassy Zone).
ori_dialog_act: 如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)

messages.ori_content: 如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)有没有会议室呢？
messages.content: Is there a meeting room at Home Inn (Beijing Yansha Embassy Zone)?
ori_dialog_act: 如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，没有会议室。
messages.content: Sorry. There is no meeting room.

messages.ori_content: 酒店的周边都有哪些餐馆呢？
messages.content: What restaurants are around the hotel?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，周边没有餐馆。
messages.content: Sorry. There are no restaurants near it.

messages.ori_content: 好的，我想从天兴居打车到如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)，请帮我查询下出租车的车型和车牌。
messages.content: Okay. I'll take a taxi from Tianxingju Restaurant to Home Inn (Beijing Yansha Embassy Zone). Could you check the car type and plate number?
ori_dialog_act: 如家快捷酒店(北京燕莎使馆区店)

messages.ori_content: 车型是#CX，车牌是#CP。
messages.content: The car type is #CX and the plate number is #CP.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢。
messages.content: Okay. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个景点(id=1)游玩。你希望景点的票价是免费的。你希望游玩的时长是3小时 - 4小时。你想知道这个景点的名称、评分。

messages.ori_content: 你好啊，我周末要还我们班的学生去一个票价是免费的景点玩，最好是可以玩3小时 - 4小时，你看我们去哪里合适呀？
messages.content: Hello. My classmates and I will visit an attraction where the ticket is free on weekends. We'd like to play for 3 hours-4 hours. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 我觉得奥林匹克森林公园更适合班级去玩。
messages.content: In my opinion, Olympic Forest Park is suitable for visiting with classmates.

messages.ori_content: 看一下这个景点的评分呗。
messages.content: Could you check the rating of this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 他家的评分是4.7分，环境是不错的了。
messages.content: The rating is 4.7 points, and the environment is good.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢你的推荐。
messages.content: Okay. Thank you for your recommendation.

messages.ori_content: 不客气！
messages.content: You're welcome!

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店的最低价格是200-300元的。你希望酒店是舒适型的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、评分、周边景点。
你要去id=1附近的景点(id=2)游玩。你希望景点的票价是不免费的。你想知道这个景点的周边餐馆、电话。
你要去一个景点(id=3)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你希望景点的票价是免费的。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边景点、地址。
你要去一个餐馆(id=4)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、推荐菜、周边酒店。

messages.ori_content: 你好，可以帮我安排一个最低价格200-300元的舒适型酒店吗？
messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a comfort hotel with a minimum price of 200-300 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 建议你去北京四季天成酒店和北京可丽亚宾馆，这些都是舒适型酒店。
messages.content: I recommend you Siji Tiancheng Hotel and Corea Hotel. Both are comfort hotels.

messages.ori_content: 好啊，我去北京四季天成酒店，它家评分高不？
messages.content: Okay. I'll go to Siji Tiancheng Hotel. Is its rating high?

messages.ori_content: 还可以，4.3分。
messages.content: Not bad, 4.3 points.

messages.ori_content: 嗯是不错，酒店周边有啥好玩的地方吗？
messages.content: Um, it’s good. Are there any attractions around the hotel?

messages.ori_content: 对不起，酒店周边没有景点。
messages.content: Sorry. There are no attractions around it.

messages.ori_content: 哦太可惜了，我还打算在酒店周边找个不免费的景点游玩呢，你有什么好的建议吗？
messages.content: Oh, it’s a pity. I was thinking about visiting an attraction with a ticket fee around the hotel. Do you have any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 没办法酒店周边没有景点啊，那就推荐你去别处玩吧，北京海洋馆，国家大剧院这些地方也都很不错呢。
messages.content: Sorry. No attractions are around the hotel. But I recommend you to play elsewhere. Beijing Aquarium and National Center for the Performing Arts are also very good.
dialog_act: National Center for the Performing Arts

messages.ori_content: 可以，就去北京海洋馆，这个景点周边应该能有好吃的餐馆吧。
messages.content: Ok. I'll go to Beijing Aquarium. There are some nice restaurants around this attraction, right?

messages.ori_content: 是啊，可多了，比如海碗居北京菜(增光路总店), 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）。
messages.content: Sure, there are a lot, such as Haiwanju Beijing Restaurant (Zengguang Road Headquater) and Huguosi Snack (Headquater).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）
海碗居北京菜(增光路总店)

messages.ori_content: 还是这边好啊，有这个景点的电话吗？
messages.content: Here is better. Do you have the telephone number of this attraction?
Well. The telephone number is 010-62176655.

messages.ori_content: 谢谢，能在帮我找一个评分是4.5分以上，票价免费的景点不，刚才没玩够。
messages.content: Thank you. Could you recommend me another ticket-free attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above? The attraction you just recommended is not enough.

messages.ori_content: 室外的你可以去天安门广场，室内的你可以去中国国家博物馆，怎么样还满意吗？
messages.content: For outdoor, you can go to the Tiananmen Square. For indoor, you can go to the National Museum of China. Are you satisfied?

messages.ori_content: 去天安门广场吧，这是一个神圣的地方，它周边还有别的景点吗？
messages.content: I'll go to The Tiananmen Square. This is a sacred place. Are there any other attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 那可多了，故宫, 天坛都是的。
messages.content: A lot, such as the Forbidden City and Temple of Heaven.

messages.ori_content: 天安门广场的地址是什么呀？
messages.content: What's the address of the Tiananmen Square?

messages.ori_content: 地址是北京市东城区长安街（天安门和正阳门之间）。
messages.content: The address is Chang'an Avenue, Dongcheng District, Beijing (between Tiananmen and Zhengyangmen).
ori_dialog_act: 北京市东城区长安街（天安门和正阳门之间）
dialog_act: Chang'an Avenue, Dongcheng District, Beijing (between Tiananmen and Zhengyangmen)

messages.ori_content: 收到，游玩结束后我打算找个人均消费50-100元的餐馆吃饭，能给推荐一个不？
messages.content: I got it. After the tour, I need to take a meal at a restaurant with a per-person cost of 50-100 yuan. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 都一处烧麦馆(前门店)和故宫餐厅都还行，你要不要试试？
messages.content: Toei Roast Wheat (Qianmen) and the Forbidden City Restaurant are good. Would you try them?

messages.ori_content: 当然是都一处烧麦馆(前门店)了，吃点肉补充点力量，它家推荐菜都有什么呀？
messages.content: Surely I'll go to Toei Roast Wheat (Qianmen), as I need meat to replenish myself. What are its recommended dishes?

messages.ori_content: 推荐菜有五彩奥运烧麦, 爆肚。
messages.content: The recommended dishes are shaomai (steamed dumpling) with five colors and sautéed pork tripe.

messages.ori_content: 听起来不错啊，它家周边都有什么酒店呀？
messages.content: Sounds good. What hotels are there around it?

messages.ori_content: 周边酒店有北京首都宾馆, 北京贵都大酒店, 北京天伦王朝酒店。
messages.content: Zhouyuan Hotel, Capital Hotel Beijing, Guidu Beijing and Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing.

messages.ori_content: 太好了，谢谢你啊！
messages.content: Great. Thank you!

messages.ori_content: 不用谢！
messages.content: You are welcome!

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是100-150元的。你想吃的菜肴是奶酪蛋糕。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、评分、地址。
你要去一个景点(id=2)游玩。你希望游玩的时长是0.5小时 - 1小时。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边酒店、电话。
你想乘坐从id=1到id=2的地铁。你想知道这个地铁的出发地附近地铁站、目的地附近地铁站。

messages.ori_content: 突然想吃奶酪蛋糕，有没有人均消费在100-150元的餐馆？
messages.content: Suddenly I get a taste for cheese cake. Is there a restaurant providing it with a per-person cost of 100-150 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 单太太贝谷面包房做的奶酪蛋糕简直是绝了。
messages.content: The cheese cake made by Mrs. Shan's Bakery is absolutely amazing.

messages.ori_content: 真的假的？这家餐馆评分怎么样？
messages.content: Really? What is this restaurant's rating?

messages.ori_content: 真的，你等我查查。
messages.content: Sure. Just a second. Let me check.

messages.ori_content: 行，查查单太太贝谷面包房的评分。
messages.content: Ok, please.

messages.ori_content: 评分4分，不过别光看这个，他家奶酪蛋糕确实好吃，我吃过。
messages.content: The rating is 4 points. But don't only judge by this. Its cheese cake is really delicious, because I have tasted it before.

messages.ori_content: 那就行，快把地址发过来吧。
messages.content: All right. Could you send the address?

messages.ori_content: 具体位置在西白辛庄村开发街5号。
messages.content: The specific address is No. 5, Kaifa Street, Xibaixinzhuang Village.

messages.ori_content: 再推荐一个游玩0.5小时-1小时的景点好不好？
messages.content: Could you recommend another attraction with a playing duration of 0.5 hours-1 hour?

messages.ori_content: 你到世界公园美洲区溜达溜达吧。
messages.content: Then go to the World Park Americas District.

messages.ori_content: 去那里的话，住宿方便吗？周边有啥酒店？
messages.content: Is it convenient for accommodation if I go there? Any hotels are around it?

messages.ori_content: 有啊，像富驿时尚酒店(北京总部基地店)、锦江之星(北京丰台东大街地铁站店)、胜高连锁酒店(北京丰台东大街店)。
messages.content: Yes, there are, such as Statue FX Hotel (Beijing Headquarter Base), Jinjiang Inn (Beijing Fengtai East Street Subway Station) and Superb Home (Beijing East Avenue).
ori_dialog_act: 富驿时尚酒店(北京总部基地店)
胜高连锁酒店(北京丰台东大街店)
锦江之星(北京丰台东大街地铁站店)
dialog_act: Jinjiang Inn (Beijing Fengtai East Street Subway Station)

messages.ori_content: 好吧，那你把联系电话告诉我吧。
messages.content: Okay. Then tell me the telephone number.
The telephone number is 010-83613344.

messages.ori_content: 坐地铁从单太太贝谷面包房到世界公园美洲区，在哪站上车比较近？
messages.content: If I take subway from Mrs. Shan's Bakery to World Park Americas District, what is the nearest departure station?

messages.ori_content: 在T2航站楼地铁站上车吧。
messages.content: You can get on the subway at T2 Subway Station.

messages.ori_content: 那在哪站下地铁比较近？
messages.content: What's the nearest destination station?

messages.ori_content: 在丰台科技园地铁站D口下地铁。
messages.content: You could get off the subway at Exit D of Fengtai Science and Technology Park Subway Station.
dialog_act: Exit d of Fengtai Science and Technology Park Subway Station

messages.ori_content: 好的，我知道了。
messages.content: Okay. I got it.

messages.ori_content: 好的。
messages.content: Ok.

messages.ori_content: 你好，可以帮我推荐一个人均消费是50-100元，评分是4.5分以上的餐馆吗？
messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 50-100 yuan and a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 好的，我最喜欢烤肉了，你知道它家地址吗？

messages.ori_content: 当然知道了，地址是北京市西城区地安门外大街前海东沿14号。

messages.ori_content: 哦了，我记下了，吃完饭我打算找个价格是200-300元，评分是4.5分以上的酒店住宿，有啥好地方推荐吗？
messages.content: Oh. I have taken it down. After meal, I need a hotel with a price of 200-300 yuan and a rating of 4.5 points or above. Any good recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 城市客栈(北京欢乐谷店)就挺适合你的，推荐给你吧。
messages.content: City Inn (Beijing Happy Valley) is quite suitable for you. I recommend it.

messages.ori_content: 好呀，它家周边有没有餐馆呀？

messages.ori_content: 必须的啊，不过周边只有德云红事会馆。
messages.content: Sure, but only Deyun Wedding Hall is around it.

messages.ori_content: 那也比没有强啊，选好酒店以后，我打算找个评分是4.5分以上，游玩时长是3小时 - 4小时的景点游玩，知道哪里比较适合我吗？
messages.content: It's better than nothing. The hotel is settled, and now I need an attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above and a playing duration of 3 hours-4 hours. Do you know which one suits me?

messages.ori_content: 潭柘寺挺好的，反正我挺喜欢，不知道是不是你的菜？

messages.ori_content: 我也还行，这个景点周边都有什么酒店啊？

messages.ori_content: 景点周边可没有酒店啊。

messages.ori_content: 不会吧，那景点周边有没有餐馆呀？

messages.ori_content: 这个可以有，清幽园农家院, 三十里轩都在它不远处。
messages.content: Sure. Qingyouyuan Farmhouse and Sanshili Xuan are not far away.

messages.ori_content: 哦了，我知道了，谢谢你啊！
messages.content: Ok. I got it. Thank you!

messages.ori_content: 别客气！

messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me an attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above where I can play for 3 days? Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去小汤山镇，评分5分，可以游玩3天。
messages.content: I recommend you Little Tang Shan Town. Its rating is 5 points and you can play for 3 days there.

messages.ori_content: 为方便就餐，周边有餐馆吗？推荐一下。
messages.content: Are there any restaurants near it for dining? Could you recommend one?

messages.ori_content: 有小汤山东北锅台鱼, 讲礼驴肉馆, 龙脉温泉度假村餐厅, 林海雪乡东北菜。
messages.content: There are Xiaotangshan Northeast Fish Hot Pot, Jiangli Donkey Restaurant, Longmai Hot Spring Resort Restaurant and Linhai Xuexiang Northeast Cuisines.

messages.ori_content: 好，把他家电话发给我一下。
messages.content: Okay. Please send me the telephone number.
The telephone numbers are 010-61781012 and 010-61781357.

messages.ori_content: 麻烦你帮我看看刚才那些周边餐馆里有没有能吃到德国香肠和意式肉酱面的，最好人均消费在50到100元的。
messages.content: I'd like to know if any restaurant among the surrounding restaurants mentioned just now provides german sausage and spaghetti, and I hope its per-person is 50-100 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 没有找到哦，推荐您去福禄居东北农家院，人均消费94元，您可以尝尝他家的东北大拉皮, 香菇肉片, 私厨炖鱼, 清炒小油菜，都很不错呢。
messages.content: I can't find such a restaurant. But I recommend you Fuluju Northeast Farmhouse with a per-person cost of 94 yuan. You can try its northeast-style tossed mung clear noodles with sesame paste, sautéed sliced pork with black mushroom, home cooking fish stew and sautéed rape. All are very tasty.
dialog_act: Northeast-style tossed mung clear noodles with sesame paste
Sautéed sliced pork with black mushroom

messages.ori_content: 好吧，他家评分是多少？
messages.content: Okay. What's its rating?
4.5 points.

messages.ori_content: 看一下附近有什么酒店？
messages.content: Could you check the hotels around it?

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，附近没有酒店哦。
messages.content: Sorry. There are no hotels near it.

messages.ori_content: 好吧，那你帮我推荐一个吧，200到300元之间，最好提供SPA和叫醒服务的，谢谢。
messages.content: Okay. Then just recommend me a hotel with a price of 200 and 300 yuan. I'll be happy if it provides SPA and wake-up service. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京尚品假日酒店，有您要的服务，价格203元。
messages.content: I recommend you Beijing Shangpin Holiday Hotel with a price of 203 yuan. It provides the services you want.

messages.ori_content: 评分是4.5分以上吗？
messages.content: Is the rating 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 是的，评分是4.6分。
messages.content: Yes, the rating is 4.6 points.

messages.ori_content: 好的，那就他家吧，他家是什么类型的？
messages.content: Okay. Then I'll just go there. What's the type of the hotel?

messages.ori_content: 舒适型的。
messages.content: Comfort type.

messages.ori_content: 好的，麻烦你再推荐一个人均消费在500到1000元的餐馆吧，谢谢。
messages.content: Okay. Could you recommend me another restaurant with a per-person cost of 500-1000 yuan? Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去厉家菜(德胜门店)，人均消费620元。
messages.content: I recommend you Family Li Imperial Cuisine (Deshengmen) wuth a per-person cost of 620 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 好，周边有什么景点吗？
messages.content: Okay. Are there any attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 有什刹海, 故宫, 天安门广场, 恭王府。
messages.content: Yes, they are Shicha lake, the Forbidden City, the Tiananmen Square and Prince Kung's Mansion.

messages.ori_content: 好的，非常感谢，有问题我再联系你。
messages.content: Okay. Thank you very much. I will contact you again if I need.

messages.ori_content: 恩，不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个景点(id=1)游玩。你希望景点的票价是免费的。你希望游玩的时长是3天。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边景点、评分。

messages.ori_content: 你好，帮我找个免费的景点，我要五一的时候是去玩3天。
messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a ticket-free attraction? I will play there for 3 days around May 1st.

messages.ori_content: 建议您去白河峡谷或霞云岭国家森林公园，预祝您玩的开心。
messages.content: I suggest you go to Baihe Gorge or Xiayunling National Forest Park. Wish you a good time!

messages.ori_content: 霞云岭国家森林公园的附近还有什么景点吗，我还想多玩几个地方呢。
messages.content: Are there any attractions near Xiayunling National Forest Park? I would like to visit a few more places.

messages.ori_content: 对不起，周边没有景点。
messages.content: Sorry. There are no attractions around it.

messages.ori_content: 没关系的，这个景点的评分是几分？
messages.content: It doesn't matter. What's the rating of this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 评分是3分。
messages.content: The rating is 3 points.

messages.ori_content: 清楚了，谢谢你。
messages.content: Get it. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 您客气了。
messages.content: You are welcome.

task description: 你要去一个景点(id=1)游玩。你希望游玩的时长是2小时。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边酒店。
你要去名叫北京凯富酒店的酒店(id=2)住宿。你想知道这个酒店的评分、地址。

messages.ori_content: 你好，能否帮我推荐个能玩上2小时的景点呢？
messages.content: Hi. Could you recommend me an attraction where I can play for 2 hours?

messages.ori_content: 建议您去烟袋斜街，那儿挺有意思的。
messages.content: I suggest you go to Yandaixie Street. It's very interesting.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，听着不错。那附近有什么好的酒店吗？
messages.content: Well. It sounds good. Are there any good hotels near it?

messages.ori_content: 有北京天伦王朝酒店, 北京都季商旅酒店和北京饭店等等。
messages.content: Yes, there are Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing, Citytel Inn Wa Beijing Hotel, etc.

messages.ori_content: 多谢。然后我定好了北京凯富酒店的房间，请问那儿的评价怎么样？
messages.content: Thanks a lot. I have booked a room at Comfort Inn and Suites Sanlitun, Beijing. What's its rating?
dialog_act: Comfort Inn and Suites Sanlitun, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 评分是4.3分。
messages.content: The rating is 4.3 points.

messages.ori_content: 可以，那酒店地址在哪呢？
messages.content: Well. What's the hotel address?

messages.ori_content: 酒店位于北京朝阳区工体北路6号。
messages.content: The hotel is at No. 6, Gongti North Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京朝阳区工体北路6号
dialog_act: No. 6, Gongti North Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 多谢亲的帮忙啦。
messages.content: Thank you for your help.

messages.ori_content: 别客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.ori_content: 你好，据说汉庭酒店(北京柳芳店)这个酒店的口碑还是不错的，你知道这个酒店的地址吗？
messages.content: Hello. It is said that Hanting Hotel (Beijing Liufang) has a good reputation. Do you know the address?

messages.ori_content: 知道的呢，地址是北京朝阳区东土城路12号。

ori_dialog_act: 北京朝阳区东土城路12号
dialog_act: No.12, Dongtucheng Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 好好，我要请我哥们吃饭，麻烦你帮我找个有羊腿这个菜的餐馆，我希望评分是4分以上，人均消费是50-100元。
messages.content: Okay. I'll invite my buddy to dinner. Could you recommend me a restaurant providing lamb leg? I hope the rating is 4 points or above, and the per-person cost is 50-100 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 建议你们去巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）或	金榜缘，都是去了这回还想去下一回的地方。
messages.content: I recommended Baron Rozi Restaurant Xinjiang Cuisine (Zhongguancun) and Jinbangyuan. Both are the restaurants where customers want to go again.
ori_dialog_act: 巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）

messages.ori_content: 巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）的附近有啥景点吗，去一回不能光顾着吃了，最好还能玩会。
messages.content: Are there any attractions near Baron Rozi Restaurant Xinjiang Cuisine (Zhongguancun)? In addition to enjoying food, I also would like to visit somewhere by the way.
ori_dialog_act: 巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）

messages.ori_content: 有4个景点的呢，是北京海洋馆, 北京动物园, 北京大学, 清华大学。
messages.content: There are 4 attractions, Beijing Aquarium, Beijing Zoo, Peking University and Tsinghua University.

messages.ori_content: 哦，在巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）的周边景点中哪个的票价是100-150元，游玩的时长是2小时 - 3小时，并且评分是4.5分以上，一口气说了这么多感觉好累啊。
messages.content: Oh. Among these attractions, which one has a ticket fee of 100-150 yuan, a playing duration of 2 hours-3 hours and a rating of 4.5 points? Saying such a long sentence, I get tired.
ori_dialog_act: 巴依老爷新疆美食（中关村店）

messages.ori_content: 推荐你们去北京海洋馆，游玩时长是3小时，但是它的门票价格是165元，。
messages.content: I recommend you Beijing Aquarium. Its play duration is 3 hours, but its ticket fee is 165 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 好的呢，那这个景点的地址是在哪里？
messages.content: Okay. What's the address of this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 地址是北京市海淀区高粱桥斜街乙18号。
messages.content: The address is No. B18, Gaoliangqiao Xie Street, Haidian District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京市海淀区高粱桥斜街乙18号
dialog_act: No. B18, Gaoliangqiao Xie Street, Haidian District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 嗯呢，那这个景点的就近还有别的景点吗，如果时间允许的话就多转转。
messages.content: Well. Are there any other attractions near this attraction? If time permits, I'll visit more places.

messages.ori_content: 有的，是北京艺术博物馆，中国古动物馆，大钟寺，万寿寺等。
messages.content: There are Beijing Art Museum, Chinese Ancient Animal Museum, the Great Bell Temple, Wanshou Temple, etc.

messages.ori_content: 你说的这些不太想去，麻烦你帮我们找个游玩的时长是0.5小时 - 1小时的景点吧。
messages.content: I don't want to go to these places you recommended. Could you recommend me an attraction with a playing duration of 0.5 hours-1 hour?

messages.ori_content: 建议你们去鸡冠山或镇山如来，都是很好玩的景点。
messages.content: I suggest you go to Hill Crest or Buddha Guarding the Mountain which are very good attractions.

messages.ori_content: 镇山如来的周边有餐馆吗，去一次必须尝尝附近的美食。
messages.content: Are there restaurants around Buddha Guarding the Mountain? I must try some nice food.

messages.ori_content: 有的呢，是龙顺达农家乐, 永乐餐厅, 游龙饭庄。
messages.content: Yes, there are Longshunda Farmhouse, Yongle Restaurant and Youlong Restaurant.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，好的，那这个景点的附近还有别的可以游玩的景点吗，可以多几个选择的。
messages.content: Um, okay. Are there any other attractions near this attraction? I prefer various choices.

messages.ori_content: 有平北抗日战争纪念馆, 神仙院, 龙庆峡, 鸡冠山。
messages.content: There are Pingbei Anti Japanese War Memorial, Immortals Place, Longqing Valley and Hill Crest.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，对了，在镇山如来周边的餐馆里哪个有羊肉片这个菜，并且人均消费是100-150元，突然很想吃这个的。
messages.content: Well. By the way, which of the restaurants around Buddha Guarding the Mountain provides the sliced lamb and has a per-person cost of 100-150 yuan? Suddenly I am hungry for that.

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，都没有羊肉片这个菜，建议你们去游龙饭庄，但是它家的人均消费是62元。
messages.content: Sorry. No one provides sliced lamb. I suggest you go to Youlong Restaurant, but its per-person cost is 62 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，好的，就去它家了，那这个餐馆的附近还有别的口味的餐馆吗，如果有是再好不过了。
messages.content: Um, okay. I'll go there. Is there any other restaurant with different flavors near this restaurant? If so, it would be better.

messages.ori_content: 只有一家叫龙顺达农家乐。
messages.content: There is only one restaurant. It is Longshunda Farmhouse.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，游龙饭庄它家没有我特想吃的羊肉片，那你推荐个它家的特色菜吧。
messages.content: Well. Youlong Restaurant doesn't provide the sliced lamb I'm hungry for. Then could you recommend its specialties?

messages.ori_content: 那就推荐您品尝它家的红烧牛肉，据说是超级好吃的。
messages.content: I suggest you taste its braised beef with brown sauce. It is said it's super delicious.

messages.ori_content: 嗯嗯，看着我都饿了，那这餐馆的附近有酒店吗，如果太晚的话就住宿了。
messages.content: Um. I get hungry by hearing this. Is there a hotel near this restaurant? If it's too late, I have to stay there.

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，周边没有酒店。
messages.content: Sorry. There is no hotel around it.

messages.ori_content: 没关系的，真的很谢谢你了。
messages.content: It's okay. Thank you very much.

messages.ori_content: 不客气呦。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店提供无烟房。你希望酒店提供行李寄存。你想知道这个酒店的名称、酒店类型。
你要去一个景点(id=2)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你希望游玩的时长是2小时 - 3小时。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边酒店。
你要去id=2附近的酒店(id=3)住宿。你希望酒店是高档型的。你希望酒店的最低价格是600-700元的。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个酒店的酒店设施是否包含部分房间提供wifi、酒店设施是否包含西式餐厅、地址。

messages.ori_content: 您好，请帮我找个提供无烟房与行李寄存的酒店，最好把酒店的类型告诉我，谢谢。
messages.content: Hello. Could you recommend me a hotel that provides non-smoking rooms and luggage storage. And I'm happy if you can tell me the type of the hotel. Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 北京鹏润国际大酒店符合您的对酒店的要求，它属于豪华型酒店。
messages.content: Grand Concordia Hotel Beijing meets your requirements. It's a luxury hotel.

messages.ori_content: 嗯，下来您在帮我找个评分在4.5分以上、游玩时间要2小时 - 3小时的景点。

messages.content: I recommend you Temple of Heaven. Its price is not high, and the playing duration and rating also meet your requirements.

messages.ori_content: 好的，那在它周边都有什么酒店呢。

messages.ori_content: 它周边的酒店有北京首都宾馆, 北京贵都大酒店, 北京天伦王朝酒店。
messages.content: The hotels around it are Capital Hotel Beijing, Guidu Hotel Beijing and Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing.

messages.ori_content: 那麻烦您在天坛附近，帮我找个高档型酒店住宿，价格在600-700元之间，评分最好在4.5分以上。
messages.content: Then could you recommend me a high-end hotel near the Temple of Heaven? I hope the price is 600-700 yuan and the rating is 4.5 points or above.

messages.content: It opens from Monday to Sunday at 08: 00-22: 00.

messages.ori_content: 那就好，把这个景点的电话发给我吧。

There are two telephone numbers, 010-68352453 and 010-68312517.

messages.ori_content: 好的吧，就这个了，帮我发一下这家店的评分和地址吧。

messages.ori_content: 不好意思哦，我没有查到这家店的评分，地址是兴华大街27号百联清城购物中心1层，还有别的问题么？

messages.ori_content: 周边没有酒店，周边的景点是上方山国家森林公园。
messages.content: There is no hotel in the surrounding and the nearby attraction is Shangfang Mountain National Forest Park.

messages.ori_content: 好的，我想从居庸关长城坐地铁到坡峰岭，帮我查询下出发地地铁站和目的地地铁站。
messages.content: Okay, I want to take the subway from Ju Yong Guan Great Wall to Pofeng Mountain and please check the departure and destination subway stations for me.

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，这两处没有地铁。
messages.content: Sorry, there is no subway station around the two places.

messages.ori_content: 好的，在帮我推荐一个价格在400-500元之间的高档型酒店。
messages.content: Okay, recommend me a high-end hotel with a price of 400-500 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐北京红墙酒店。
messages.content: I recommend Redwall Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 北京红墙酒店的电话是多少？附近有啥好吃的餐厅？
messages.content: What is the telephone number of Redwall Hotel Beijing? Is there any restaurant with delicious dishes near it?
The telephone number is 010-51098888, but there is no restaurant near it.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢。
messages.content: Okay, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想吃的菜肴是清汤。你希望餐馆的人均消费是150-500元的。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、电话、周边景点。
你要去一个景点(id=2)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4分以上。你希望游玩的时长是2小时。你想知道这个景点的名称、地址、门票。
你想乘坐从id=1到id=2的地铁。你想知道这个地铁的出发地附近地铁站、目的地附近地铁站。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我要请朋友吃饭，我想找一个人均消费在150-500元之间的并且可以吃到清汤的餐馆，最好是评分在4.5分以上的，有推荐的吗？
messages.content: Hello, I want to invite a friend for a meal. I need to find a restaurant with a per-person cost of 150-500 yuan where we can have clear soup. The rating should be 4.5 points or above. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去王品牛排(北京亦庄店)。
messages.content: I recommend you Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang).

messages.ori_content: 王品牛排(北京亦庄店)的电话是多少？
messages.content: What is the telephone number of it?

messages.ori_content: 这家餐馆的周边都有啥景点呢？
messages.content: Are there any attractions around this restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，周边并没有景点。
messages.content: Sorry, there is no attraction near it.

messages.ori_content: 好的，吃饱喝足了该去玩了，我想找一个能玩2小时的并且评分在4分以上的景点，有推荐的没？
messages.content: OK. After eating and drinking, I want to find an attraction where I can play for 2 hours and with a rating of 4 points or above. Any recommendations?

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐富国海底世界。
messages.content: I recommend Fuguo Undersea World.

messages.ori_content: 富国海底世界的地址在哪呢？另外门票费得多少钱？
messages.content: Where is it? How about the ticket of it?

messages.ori_content: 地址是北京市朝阳区工体南路工人体育场南门，门票是免费的。
messages.content: It is at South Gate of Workers Stadium, Gongti South Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing. And it is free.
ori_dialog_act: 北京市朝阳区工体南路工人体育场南门
dialog_act: South Gate of Workers Stadium, Gongti South Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 好的，我想从王品牛排(北京亦庄店)坐地铁到富国海底世界，请帮我查询下出发地地铁站和目的地地铁站。
messages.content: Okay, I want to take the subway from Wang Pin Steak (Beijing Yizhuang) to Fuguo Undersea World. Please check the subway stations of departure and destination for me.

messages.ori_content: 出发地地铁站是荣京东街地铁站A1口，目的地地铁站是灯市口地铁站A口。
messages.content: The departure subway station is Rongjing Dongjie Subway Station Exit A1 and the destination one is Dengshikou Subway Station Exit A.
dialog_act: Rongjing Dongjie Subway Station Exit A1

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢。
messages.content: Okay, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个景点(id=1)游玩。你希望游玩的时长是1小时 - 2小时。你希望景点的票价是100-150元的。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边餐馆、评分。
你要去一个酒店(id=2)住宿。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你希望酒店的最低价格是200-300元的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、周边餐馆、周边景点。
你要去id=2附近的景点(id=3)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你希望游玩的时长是1小时 - 2小时。你想知道这个景点的电话、周边酒店。
你要去id=2附近的餐馆(id=4)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是500-1000元的。你想知道这个餐馆的推荐菜。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想找一个游玩时长1小时 - 2小时，票价是100-150元的景点游玩，能给推荐一个吗？
messages.content: Hello, I want to find an attraction with a playing duration of 1-2 hours and a fee of 100-150 yuan. Can you please recommend one?

messages.ori_content: 长城脚下的公社是您最好的选择。
messages.content: Commune by the Great Wall is your best choice.

messages.ori_content: 好的，这个景点周边有餐馆吗？
messages.content: Okay, are there any restaurants around it?

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，没有。
messages.content: Sorry, no.

messages.ori_content: 哦，没关系，能帮我查一下景点的评分是多少吗？
messages.content: Oh, it doesn't matter. Can you check the rating of it?

messages.ori_content: 真是抱歉呢，也没有查到景点的评分信息，你看还有其他问题吗？
messages.content: I'm really sorry, but I didn't find the rating of it. Do you have any other questions?

messages.ori_content: 算了，我打算游玩之后找个地方休息，帮我推荐一个评分4.5分以上，最低价格200-300元的酒店吧。
messages.content: Well, I want to find a place to rest after playing. Please recommend a hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above and a minimum price of 200-300 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 那我给你推荐北京美第奇精选酒店和7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)吧。
messages.content: I recommend Beijing Medici Hotel and 7 Days Inn (Beijing Xueyuan Road II).
ori_dialog_act: 7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)

messages.ori_content: 就去7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)吧，帮我看一下它周边有什么好吃的餐馆？
messages.content: I'd like go to 7 Days Inn (Beijing Xueyuan Road II). And please check the restaurants with delicious dishes around it.
ori_dialog_act: 7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)

messages.ori_content: 非常抱歉，没有查到酒店周边餐馆信息，还有什么其他能帮到你的吗？
messages.content: I'm sorry, but I didn't find any around it. Is there anything else I can help you?

messages.ori_content: 那它周边有好玩的景点吗？
messages.content: Are there any interesting attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 不巧了，也没有好玩的景点。
messages.content: Unfortunately, there is no nearby attraction.

messages.ori_content: 我的天啊，我还打算在7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)周边找一个评分4.5分以上，游玩时长1小时 - 2小时的景点游玩呢，你能帮我推荐一个吗？
messages.content: Oh my god. I also want to find an attraction around 7 Days Inn (Beijing Xueyuan Road II) with a rating of 4.5 points or above and a playing duration of 1-2 hours. Can you recommend one?
ori_dialog_act: 7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)

messages.ori_content: 对不起，真没有这样的景点，酒店周边根本没有景点，给您推荐个别处的景点吧，篱苑图书馆和韩美林艺术馆都是不错的选择。
messages.content: Sorry, there is no one. Actually, there is no attraction around the hotel. I recommend you Liyuan Library and Han Meilin Art Museum, and they are good choices.

messages.ori_content: 没事，就去篱苑图书馆转转吧，把这里电话告诉我一下。
messages.content: It ’s okay, I'd like to go to Liyuan Library and tell me its telephone number.
You can take a note, and it is 13910105454.

messages.ori_content: 我天，是私人电话吗，景点周边有酒店吗？
messages.content: God, is it a private one? Are there any hotels around it?

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，没有啊！
messages.content: Sorry, no.

messages.ori_content: 我还想去7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)附近的餐馆用餐，给我推荐个人均消费500-1000元的餐馆吧。
messages.content: I also want to go to restaurants near 7 Days Inn (Beijing Xueyuan Road II). Please recommend me some restaurants with a per-person cost of 500-1000 yuan.
ori_dialog_act: 7天连锁酒店(北京学院路二店)

messages.ori_content: 这个真没有，酒店周边没有餐馆，推荐您去福楼法餐厅 FLO和德云红事会馆，你看怎么样？
messages.content: No, there is not such a restaurant around the hotel. You can go to Flo French Restaurant FLO and Deyun Wedding Hall. How do you like them?

messages.ori_content: 德云红事会馆好呀，是不是跟德云社有关系呀，这里都有什么推荐菜呀？
messages.content: Deyun Wedding Hall is good. Dose it have something to do with Deyun Society? Any recommended dishes there?

messages.ori_content: 推荐菜有鸡豆花炖海参, 豉椒牛肉粒。
messages.content: Recommended dishes are braised sea cucumber with chicken tofu pudding and black pepper beef.
dialog_act: Braised sea cucumber with chicken tofu pudding

messages.ori_content: 哦了，真是太谢谢你了！
messages.content: Oh, thank you very much.

messages.ori_content: 不用客气！
messages.content: You are welcome!

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是干锅手撕包菜。你希望餐馆的评分是5分。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、地址、营业时间。
你要去一个酒店(id=2)住宿。你希望酒店是舒适型的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、价格、评分。

messages.ori_content: 你好，能帮我找个评分是5分，推荐菜有干锅手撕包菜的餐馆吗，我打算请朋友吃饭。
messages.content: Hello, please find a restaurant with a rating of 5 points where I can eat dry pan shredded cabbage. I plan to invite friends for meal there.

messages.ori_content: 抱歉没有查到符合条件的餐馆，给你推荐一个评分是4分的麻辣人生吧，你看行不？
messages.content: Sorry, none of them meets your needs. I recommend Spicy Life with a rating of 4 points. Is it okay?

messages.ori_content: 可以，能吃到我想吃的菜就行，它家地址你知道吗？
messages.content: Yes, it is okay, if I can eat that dish. Do you know its address?

messages.ori_content: 当然了，地址是兴华大街19号。
messages.content: Of course, it is at No. 19, Xinghua Street.

messages.ori_content: 好的，可以帮我查一下餐馆的营业时间吗？
messages.content: Okay, can you check the opening hours of it?

messages.ori_content: 没问题，营业时间是周一至周日 09:30-22:30。
messages.content: No problem, it is from Monday to Sunday at 09: 30-22: 30.

messages.ori_content: 这个时段还算不错，我正好有时间去，饭后我指定得在这边住下了，你能帮我先预定一个舒适型的酒店吗？
messages.content: This time is good. Then, I'm free to go. I have to stay here after the meal. Can you book a comfort hotel for me?

messages.ori_content: 那我先帮你安排在维也纳国际酒店(北京首体店)好吗？
messages.content: Can I book Grand Hotel Wien (Beijing Capital Stadium) for you?
ori_dialog_act: 维也纳国际酒店(北京首体店)

messages.ori_content: 可以呀，能帮我查一下这个酒店的价格和评分吗？
messages.content: Yes, can you check the price and rating of it?

messages.ori_content: 好呀，酒店价格是638元，评分是4.7分。
messages.content: Okay, the price is 638 yuan and the rating is 4.7 points.

messages.ori_content: 都还不错，我挺满意，谢谢你啊。
messages.content: That's great. I am quite satisfied, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不用谢！
messages.content: You are welcome.

你要去一个餐馆(id=3)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想吃的菜肴是百万大拌菜。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、电话、周边景点。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想找一个能玩3小时的并且评分在4.5分以上的景点，帮我推荐下。
messages.content: Hello, I want to find an attraction where I can play for 3 hours with a rating of 4.5 points or above. Please recommend one.

messages.ori_content: 给您推荐世界花卉大观园。
messages.content: I recommend you World Flower Garden.

messages.ori_content: 这个景点的地址在哪呢？

messages.ori_content: 地址在北京市丰台区南四环中路235号（右外草桥南四环路马家楼立交桥北侧）。

messages.ori_content: 好的，我想找一个价位在100-200元之间的能提供酒吧和桑拿服务的酒店入住，我希望评分在4分以上的，帮我推荐下吧。

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐金百万烤鸭店(顺义店)。

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，周边没有景点。

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢。

messages.ori_content: 不客气。

你要去名叫北京亚运村民宿的酒店(id=2)住宿。你想知道这个酒店的酒店类型、酒店设施是否包含行李寄存。

messages.ori_content: 正隆斋素食餐厅这家餐馆有您想吃的菜。

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有姚记炒肝店（鼓楼店）、北京全聚德(王府井店)、护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）。

messages.ori_content: 你好，我第一次来北京，帮我推荐一个人均消费50-100元的餐馆吧！
messages.content: Hello, this is my first trip to Beijing, could you recommend me a restaurant with a per-person cost of 50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 好的，欢迎您来北京！北京有很多特色餐馆，故宫餐厅就是其中之一。
messages.content: Okay, welcome to Beijing! There are many speciality restaurants in Beijing, and The Forbidden City Restaurant is one of them.

messages.ori_content: 故宫餐厅评分多少啊？周边住宿方便吗？
messages.content: What's the rating of The Forbidden City Restaurant? Does it have a convenient accommodation around?

messages.ori_content: 故宫餐厅的评分是4.8分，已经是评价非常高的餐馆了。周边住宿也很方便，有北京天伦王朝酒店、北京饭店、北京首都宾馆这三家酒店。
messages.content: The Forbidden City Restaurant has a rating of 4.8 points, which is very high. The accommodation there is also very convenient. There are three hotels nearby, they are Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing Hotel and Capital Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢！在故宫餐厅周边的酒店里，哪个酒店能提供行李寄存和无烟房呢？
messages.content: Okay thank you! Among the hotels around The Forbidden City Restaurant, which one provides luggage storage and non-smoking rooms?

messages.content: Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing Hotel and Capital Hotel Beijing provide both services.

messages.ori_content: 那么哪家酒店是价格1000元以上的呢？
messages.content: Then which hotel has a price of 1000 yuan or above?

messages.ori_content: 那您在北京饭店和北京首都宾馆中间选择一家吧！

messages.content: Its rating is 4.3 points.

messages.ori_content: 我想从故宫餐厅坐地铁到北京饭店，在哪上车？在哪下车？

messages.ori_content: 您在灯市口地铁站A口上车，在王府井地铁站下车就可以。
messages.content: You can get on the subway at Dengshikou Subway Station Exit A and get off at Wangfujing Subway Station.

messages.content: What restaurants are around this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有北京全聚德(王府井店)、3护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）。
messages.content: The restaurants around it are Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing) and Huguosi Snack (Headquater).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 景点的电话是多少啊？
messages.content: What's the telephone number of the attraction?
The telephone number is 010-87559666.

messages.ori_content: 好的，游玩结束后我要去味彩炭火烤肉吃饭，请告诉我这家餐馆的电话多少？
messages.content: Okay, I'll go to Weicai Charcoal Barbecue for dinner after the tour. Could you tell me the telephone number of this restaurant?
The telephone number is 65777878.

messages.ori_content: 这个餐馆有啥推荐菜啊？
messages.content: What are the recommended dishes in this restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 推荐菜有精品烤肉、牛肩峰。
messages.content: The recommended dishes are refined roast meat and ox shoulder.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢你了。
messages.content: Okay, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你想吃的菜肴是鸭肠儿。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、评分、周边餐馆。
你要去一个景点(id=2)游玩。你希望游玩的时长是3天。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个景点的名称、电话、周边餐馆。
你要去id=2附近的餐馆(id=3)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是干炸素丸子。你想知道这个餐馆的营业时间、周边景点。
你要去名叫北京泰山饭店的酒店(id=4)住宿。你想知道这个酒店的周边餐馆、价格。
你要去id=4附近的餐馆(id=5)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是白灼基围虾、黑椒石锅牛仔骨。你希望餐馆的评分是4分以上。你希望餐馆的人均消费是100-150元的。你想知道这个餐馆的营业时间、电话。

messages.ori_content: 你好！我比较爱吃鸭肠儿，请问北京哪家餐馆做这个比较地道？当然，人均消费控制在50至100元之间就行。
messages.content: Hello! I like duck intestines, which restaurant in Beijing cooks it very well? Of course, I hope its per-person cost is 50-100 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 你好！卖鸭肠儿的餐馆还真有，海底捞火锅(白家庄店)就不错，不过人均消费是115元。而且，据我了解，也没有你那个价位区间的。
messages.content: Hello! There are some restaurants providing duck intestines, and Haidilao Hotpot (Baijiazhuang) is a good one, but the per-person cost is 115 yuan. Moreover, as far as I know, there is no restaurant having a price as you required.

messages.ori_content: 好吧，有就行。那你能告诉我，他家评分如何？
messages.content: Okay, as long as there are restaurants providing it. Then could you tell me what's its rating?

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，目前他家暂无评分信息。
messages.content: Sorry, currently there is no rating information for it.

messages.ori_content: 哦，知道了。那他家周边还有别的餐馆可以选择么？
messages.content: Oh, got it. Are there other restaurants around this one?

messages.ori_content: 那倒是有，像那家小馆(永安里店)、北新桥卤煮老店、外婆家(北京apm店)都还不错。
messages.content: Yes, there are restaurants like Najia Restaurant (Yong'anli), Beixin Bridge Stewed Pork Offal Restaurant and Grandma's Home (Beijing apm), they are all pretty good.
dialog_act: Beixin Bridge Stewed Pork Offal Restaurant

messages.ori_content: 行，我知道了。那你说，如果想出去游玩3天，有没有评分在4.5以上的景点？
messages.content: OK, I get it. Then if I want to play for 3 days, is there an attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 当然有了，你去小汤山镇吧，周边还有吃饭和游玩的地方。
messages.content: Of course, you can go to Xiaotangshan Town, there are also places for dining and visiting around it.

messages.ori_content: 您想的真周到，麻烦你告诉我一下小汤山镇的电话吧？
messages.content: You are really thoughtful. Could you tell me the telephone number?
The telephones numbers are 010-61781012 and 010-61781357, you can call either.

messages.ori_content: 我记一下啊。那小汤山镇周边的餐馆里，有啥比较好的推荐吗？
messages.content: Let me note down. Are there any good restaurants around Xiaotangshan Town?

messages.ori_content: 有特色的还真不少，像小汤山东北锅台鱼、讲礼驴肉馆、龙脉温泉度假村餐厅都比较赞。
messages.content: There are a lot of unique restaurants, such as Xiaotangshan Northeast Fish Hot Pot, Jiangli Donkey Restaurant and Longmai Hot Spring Resort Restaurant, they are all quite good.

messages.ori_content: 好吧，那就去小汤山镇周边选一家馆子吃点特色的。孩子们想吃干炸素丸了，有没有卖这个菜的餐馆？
messages.content: Okay, then I'll go to Xiaotangshan Town and choose a restaurant near it enjoying some specialties. The children want dry fried vegetarian balls, are there any restaurants providing this?

messages.ori_content: 这你可把我难住了，小汤山镇附近饭店很少有这个菜。非要吃的话，你得去柴锅居(昌平店)，距离稍远。
messages.content: You got me stumped! Few restaurants near Xiaotangshan Town provide this dish. If you insist, you may go to Chaiguoju (Changping), it's a little far away.

messages.ori_content: 那也行，远就远点。你知道那里的营业时间么？
messages.content: A little far is ok. Do you know the opening hours there?
The opening hours are quite complicated, please read carefully. Spring and Winter: Monday to Sunday 09:00-14:00 16:00-21:00; Summer and Autumn: Monday to Sunday 09:00-14:00 17:00-21:30.
dialog_act: Spring, winter Monday to Sunday 09: 00-14: 00 16: 00-21: 00 summer, autumn Monday to Sunday 09: 00-14: 00 17: 00-21: 30

messages.ori_content: 这还区分季节啊。在这个柴锅居(昌平店)吃完饭，周边有啥景点可以转转？
messages.content: The opening hours varies with seasons! After taking a dinner at Chaiguoju (Changping), is there any attraction for us to play ?

messages.ori_content: 有中国航空博物馆，值得一逛。
messages.content: There is China Aviation Museum, it is worth a visit.

messages.ori_content: 好的，我记住了。另外，我订的酒店是北京泰山饭店，也不知道那里周围有没有合适的餐馆。你熟悉不？
messages.content: Okay, I note it down. In addition, I booked a room at Taishan Hotel Beijing, but I don’t know if there are suitable restaurants around it. Are you familiar with that?

messages.ori_content: 这个酒店周围可有不少好餐馆，像庆丰包子铺(西三旗店)、工美蓝孔雀商务酒店、九十九顶毡房(清河店)都挺火。
messages.content: There are many good restaurants around this hotel, such as Qing-Feng Steamed Dumpling Shop (Xisanqi), Gongmei Blue Peacock Business Hotel and Ninety-nine Roof House (Qinghe).

messages.ori_content: 那这个酒店的价格呢，高不高？
messages.content: What about the price of this hotel, is it high?

messages.ori_content: 还行，595元，在北京也就一般水平吧。
messages.content: The price is nice, 595 yuan, it's in an average level in Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 那我详细了解以下，北京泰山饭店周边的餐馆有没有4分以上，人均消费能把控在100-150元之间的，而且能吃到白灼基围虾、黑椒石锅牛仔骨的？
messages.content: Then I'd like to know some details. I want scalded shrimp, sautéed short rib in a stone pot with black pepper, are there such restaurants around Taishan Hotel Beijing with a rating of 4 points or above and a per-person cost of 100-150 yuan?
dialog_act: Sautéed short rib in a stone pot with black pepper

messages.ori_content: 这要求太高了，真心没有啊。要想同时吃到这两样菜，你只能去青年餐厅(马驹桥店)，人均消费是71元，而且没有评分信息，也不在北京泰山饭店附近。
messages.content: The requirement is so high, and there's really no restaurant meeting it. To take these two dishes at the same time, you have go to Youth Restaurant (Majuqiao), which is the only one providing them. Its per-person cost is 71 yuan, but it neither has a rating information nor is near Taishan Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 行啊，那也行，就想吃这口。你把营业时间告诉我吧，有没有？
messages.content: That's okay, I'm just hungry for them. Could you tell me the opening hours?
Sure. The opening hours are Monday to Sunday 11:00-14:00 17:00-21:30.

messages.ori_content: 好的，我记住了。有他家电话吗？
messages.content: Okay, I note it down. Do you have its telephone number?

messages.ori_content: 当然有，你问对人了，他家电话是010-60595281。
messages.content: Of course, you ask the right person. The telephone number is 010-60595281.

messages.ori_content: 问了这么多，真是添麻烦了。
messages.content: Thank you very much for all the trouble you have taken.

messages.ori_content: 这没有啥。
messages.content: It's nothing.

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店是经济型的。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个酒店的价格、名称。

messages.ori_content: 你好，可以帮我推荐一个评分4.5分以上的经济型酒店吗？
messages.content: Hello, could you recommend me a budget hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 当然可以，为您推荐锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)和中安之家连锁(北京中安宾馆)。

锦江之星(北京奥体中心店)

messages.ori_content: 就去中安之家连锁(北京中安宾馆)吧，麻烦你帮我查一下酒店的价格。
messages.content: I'll go to Beijing Dongdan Hotel (Beijing Zhongan Hotel). Could you check the hotel price for me?
ori_dialog_act: 中安之家连锁(北京中安宾馆)

messages.ori_content: 价格是294元。
messages.content: The price is 294 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 价格很舒服，明天我要去名叫大运河森林公园的景点游玩，帮我查一下这个景点的周边还有哪些其他景点好吗？
messages.content: The price is affordable. Tomorrow I will go to an attraction called Grand Canal Forest Park. Could you check what other attractions are around it?

messages.ori_content: 没问题，周边景点有绿岛乐园。
messages.content: Sure, Green Island Paradise is near it.

messages.ori_content: 太好了，我想去大运河森林公园周边的景点游玩，哪个游玩时长3小时 - 4小时，评分4.5分以上，票价免费呢？
messages.content: Great, I'll visit an attraction around Grand Canal Forest Park. Could you tell me which free attraction has a rating of 4.5 points or above? I'd like to play there for 3 hours-4 hours.

messages.ori_content: 对不起，没有查到符合条件的景点信息，大运河森林公园周边只有绿岛乐园一个景点，这里门票39元，游玩时间3天，评分4.7分，你看行吗？
messages.content: Sorry, I didn't find any attractions meeting the needs. Only Green Island Paradise is around the Grand Canal Forest Park. The ticket fee is 39 yuan, the playing time is 3 days, and the rating is 4.7 points. Is it ok?

messages.ori_content: 可以，绿岛乐园的电话是多少？
messages.content: Ok, what's the telephone number of Green Island Paradise?
The telephone number is 010-61569200.

messages.ori_content: 记下了，景点周边酒店都有什么？
messages.content: Noted, what are the hotels around the attractions?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，没有查到景点周边酒店的信息。
messages.content: Sorry, I didn't find any information about hotels around it.

messages.ori_content: 啊哦，好吧，我饿了，想吃烤羊蝎子，你先帮我找一个能做这道菜，评分4.5分以上的餐馆吧。
messages.content: Okay, I'm hungry and I want roast lamb spine. Could you recommend me a restaurant that provides this dish and has a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 为您推荐呼伦贝尔草原蒙古包美食和郭靖烤全羊，两家都很不错，你感觉如何？
messages.content: I recommend Hulunbeier Mongolia Gourmet and Guo Jing Roasted Whole Lamb, both of which are very good. Is it ok?
ori_dialog_act: 呼伦贝尔草原蒙古包美食

messages.ori_content: 我想尝尝郭靖烤全羊的味道，有大侠的味道，能把地址告诉我一下不？
messages.content: I want to try the Guo Jing roasted whole lamb, it makes me sense the heroes. Could you tell me the address?

messages.ori_content: 地址是兴寿镇沙坨村昌金路。
messages.content: It is Jiji Changjin Road, Shatuo Village, Xingshou Town.
dialog_act: Changjin Road, Shatuo Village, Xingshou Town

messages.ori_content: 收到，餐馆周边有什么好玩的景点吗？
messages.content: Ok, are there any good attractions around the restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 必须滴，周边景点有草莓博览园, 洼里博物馆, 小汤山镇。
messages.content: Sure, the attractions near it are Strawberry Expo Park, Wali Museum and Xiaotangshan Town.

messages.ori_content: 太好了，真是太谢谢你了！
messages.content: Great, thank you so much!

messages.ori_content: 您太客气了！
messages.content: You are welcome!

messages.ori_content: 你好，我想去酒店住宿。请帮我找一家最低价格是200-300元的可以行李寄存的酒店。

messages.content: There are many hotels that meet your requirements. I recommend you 99 Inn (Beijing Tsinghua University).

messages.ori_content: 嗯呢。99旅馆连锁(北京清华大学店)这家酒店的评分是4.5分以上并且有接站服务吗？
messages.content: Well, Does it have a rating of 4.5 points or above and provide pick-up service?

messages.ori_content: 不好意思，不符合您的要求，推荐您去波菲特怀旧主题酒店(北京南锣鼓巷店)。
messages.content: Sorry, it doesn't meet your requirements. Then I recommend you Perfect Nostalgia Inn (Beijing South Luogu Lane).
