messages.ori_content: 收到，那你知道酒店的地址吗？
messages.content: Got it, do you know the address of the hotel?

messages.ori_content: 地址在北京朝阳区民族园路9号院甲1号楼。
messages.content: The address is Building A1, Yard 9, Minzuyuan Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 哦了，住下以后我要去名叫大运河森林公园的景点溜达，帮我查一下这个景点周边还有什么景点呗。

messages.ori_content: 没问题，周边景点有绿岛乐园。
messages.content: Ok, Green Island Paradise is near it.

messages.ori_content: OK，我知道了，太谢谢 你了！
messages.content: Ok, got it, thank you so much!

messages.ori_content: 不用客气！
messages.content: You are welcome!

messages.ori_content: 报歉，酒店周边的餐馆没有钉肉饼，为您找到清真回民饭馆有这道菜，您看可以吗？

messages.ori_content: 那好吧，清真回民饭馆人均消费是多少？周边有什么景点？
messages.content: Well, ok, what's the per-person cost of Halal Hui Restaurant? What are the surrounding attractions?

messages.ori_content: 人均消费是55元，周边景点有天安门广场、前门大街、故宫、恭王府。
messages.content: The per-person cost is 55 yuan, and there is the Tiananmen Square, Qianmen Street, the Forbidden City and Prince Kung's Mansion near it.

messages.ori_content: 好的，没有问题了，谢谢，再见！
messages.content: Ok, that's all my questions, thank you, bye!

messages.ori_content: 不客气！祝您生活愉快！
messages.content: You're welcome! Wish you a happy life!

messages.ori_content: 周边的景点有东方普罗旺斯薰衣草庄园, 红螺湖鸟岛景区。
messages.content: There are Oriental Provence Lavender Manor and Hongluo Lake Bird Island Scenic Spot.

dialog_act: Hongluo Lake Bird Island Scenic Spot

messages.ori_content: 餐馆的周边有哪些酒店啊？
messages.content: What hotels are there around the restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 抱歉，周边没有酒店。
messages.content: Sorry, there are no hotels around it.

messages.ori_content: 吃完饭我想找一个评分4.5分以上，可游玩时间2小时的景点游玩，给推荐一个吧。
messages.content: I'd like to find an attraction that has a rating of 4.5 points or above and a playing duration of 2 hours after eating. Could you recommend one?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去故宫游玩。
messages.content: I recommend you The Forbidden City.

messages.ori_content: 这个景点的周边有哪些餐馆啊？
messages.content: What restaurants are around this attraction?

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有北京全聚德(王府井店), 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）。
messages.content: There are Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing) and Huguosi Snack (headquater).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 景点的地址是在哪啊？
messages.content: What is the address of the attraction?

messages.ori_content: 地址是在北京市东城区景山前街4号。
messages.content: The address is No. 4, Jingshanqian Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京市东城区景山前街4号
dialog_act: No.4, Jingshanqian Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢你了。
messages.content: Okay, thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个餐馆(id=1)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是5分。你希望餐馆的人均消费是50-100元的。你想知道这个餐馆的名称、周边景点、营业时间。

你要去一个酒店(id=3)住宿。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你希望酒店是豪华型的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、地址、周边景点。

messages.ori_content: 请给我推荐一个评分是5分，人均消费在50-100元的餐馆。
messages.content: Could you please recommend me a restaurant with a rating of 5 points and per-person cost of 50-100 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去海底捞火锅(西单店)。
messages.content: I recommend you Haidilao Hot Pot (Xidan).

messages.ori_content: 海底捞火锅(西单店)营业时间是多少，周边都有哪些景点？
messages.content: What is the opening time of Haidilao Hot Pot (Xidan)? And are there any attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 营业时间是周一至周日 09:00-07:00，周边的景点有故宫、天安门广场、前门大街、恭王府、中国人民革命军事博物馆。
messages.content: It opens at 09: 00-07: 00 from Monday to Sunday. There are The Forbidden City, The Tiananmen Square, Qianmen Street, Prince Kung ’s Mansion and Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution.
ori_dialog_act: 中国人民革命军事博物馆
dialog_act: Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution

messages.ori_content: 给我推荐一个门票在100-150元，游玩时间在1.5小时 - 2小时的景点？
messages.content: Could you recommend me an attraction with a ticket of 100-150 yuan and a playing duration of 1.5 hours-2 hours?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去国话先锋剧场，是免费的。
messages.content: I recommend you the Pioneer Theatre of Mandarin, it is free.

messages.ori_content: 国话先锋剧场周边有什么餐厅吗？
messages.content: Are there any restaurants around Pioneer Theatre of Mandarin?

messages.ori_content: 周边的餐馆有姚记炒肝店（鼓楼店）、护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）、北京全聚德(王府井店)。
messages.content: There are Yao Ji Fried Liver Restaurant (Gulou), Huguosi Snack (headquater) and Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 给我推荐一个评分是4.5分以上的豪华型餐厅。
messages.content: Could you recommend me a luxury restaurant with a rating of 4. 5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京丽晶酒店。
messages.content: I recommend you Regent Hotel Beijing.

messages.ori_content: 北京丽晶酒店地址在哪，周边有什么景点吗？
messages.content: What is the address of Regent Hotel Beijing? And are there any attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 北京丽晶酒店地址在北京东城区金宝街99号，周边的景点有雍和宫、今日美术馆、地坛、三里屯酒吧街、蜂巢剧场。
messages.content: Regent Hotel Beijing is located at No. 99, Jinbao Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing. There are Lama Temple, Today Art Museum, Di Tan, Sanlitun Bar Street and Beehive Theatre.
dialog_act: No. 99, Jinbao Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 谢谢。
messages.content: Thank you.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

task description: 你要去一个酒店(id=1)住宿。你希望酒店是经济型的。你希望酒店的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个酒店的名称、周边餐馆、酒店设施是否包含叫醒服务、酒店设施是否包含接站服务。
你要去id=1附近的餐馆(id=2)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你想吃的菜肴是宫保鸡丁盖饭。你想知道这个餐馆的电话。
你要去一个景点(id=3)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4.5分以上。你想知道这个景点的名称、游玩时间、门票。
你想呼叫从id=2到id=3的出租车。你想知道这个出租的车型、车牌。

messages.ori_content: 你好，今天外地的朋友过来，有没有评分4.5分以上的经济型酒店给我找一个？
messages.content: Hello, my friends from other places came here today, could you recommend me a budget hotel with a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 为您找了一个叫格林豪泰(北京首都机场新国展地铁站店)的店，那儿还是不错的。
messages.content: I recommend you go to GreenTree Inn (Beijing Capital International Airport Xinguozhan Metro Station), it is wonderful.
ori_dialog_act: 格林豪泰(北京首都机场新国展地铁站店)
dialog_act: GreenTree Inn (Beijing Capital International Airport Xinguozhan Metro Station)

messages.ori_content: 那我就带朋友住那了。对了，那周围有吃饭的地方吧？
messages.content: Then I will take my friends there. By the way, are there any restaurants around it?

messages.ori_content: 必须有，例如天意小馆(祥云小镇店), 小吊梨汤(后沙峪店)和依皓厨房(中粮祥云店）等等。
messages.content: There are many restaurants, such as Tianyi Restaurant (Xiangyun Town), Xiaodiao Litang (Houshayu), Yihao Kitchen (COFCO Xiangyun Store), etc.

messages.ori_content: 那就行。还有啊，酒店提不提供叫醒服务和接招服务呢？
messages.content: OK. In addition, does the hotel offer wake-up and pick-up services?

messages.ori_content: 接站服务有，叫醒服务没有。
messages.content: Pick-up service is available, wake-up service is not available.

messages.ori_content: 我了解了。那在你之前提过的酒店周围的餐馆里，有没有评分是4.5分以上还能吃着宫保鸡丁盖饭的地方呢？
messages.content: I see. Is there a restaurant around the hotel you mentioned earlier with rice served with kung pao chicken on top and a rating of 4.5 points or above?
dialog_act: Rice served with kung pao chicken on top

messages.ori_content: 这个还真没找到。要不您辛苦点到护国寺小吃吃吧，而且那儿的评分也只有3.5分，您觉得行吗？
messages.content: I didn't find it. You can enjoy at Huguo Temple Snacks, but the rating is only 3.5 points, is it ok?

messages.ori_content: 好吧。有电话没？
messages.content: Ok. Do you have the telephone number?
Just call 57201918.

messages.ori_content: 成。你接着帮我找个评分4.5分以上的景点吧。
messages.content: Ok. Could you recommend me an attraction with a rating of 4.5 points or above?

messages.ori_content: 您要不要去国家大剧院转转呀？
messages.content: Would you like to go to National Center for the Performing Arts?
dialog_act: National Center for the Performing Arts

messages.ori_content: 可以呀，能玩多久？
messages.content: Yes, how long will it take to visit there?

messages.ori_content: 能玩上1小时 - 2小时，不会累。
messages.content: You may spend 1 hour-2 hours there, and you will not get tired.

messages.ori_content: 那门票什么价？
messages.content: What's the ticket of the attraction?
30 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 都不错。那如果我们想打车从护国寺小吃到国家大剧院，能告诉我出租的车型和车牌吗？
messages.content: Everything is good. If we want to take a taxi from Huguo Temple Snacks to National Center for the Performing Arts, could you tell me the rental car type and the plate number?
dialog_act: National Center for the Performing Arts

messages.ori_content: 没问题啊，车型是#CX，车牌是#CP。
messages.content: No problem, the car type is #CX and the plate number is #CP

messages.ori_content: 好。我现在没有任何问题了。
messages.content: Ok. I don't have any problems now.

messages.ori_content: 那以后有事再联系。
messages.content: Connect me anytime you want.

你要去id=3附近的餐馆(id=4)用餐。你想吃的菜肴是乳瓜沾酱。你希望餐馆的评分是5分。你想知道这个餐馆的人均消费。

messages.ori_content: 你好，帮我确认一下北京金泰四合院煦园宾馆(原煦园四合院主题酒店)能接待外宾吗，酒店的地址在哪？
messages.content: Hello, could you help me to confirm whether Jintai Siheyuan Xu Yard Hotel (Formerly Xuyuan Siheyuan Theme Hotel) can provide foreign guests reception, and what is the address of the hotel?
ori_dialog_act: 北京金泰四合院煦园宾馆(原煦园四合院主题酒店)
dialog_act: Jintai Siheyuan Xu Yard Hotel (Formerly Xuyuan Siheyuan Theme Hotel)

messages.ori_content: 经过确认，可以接待外宾，地址在北京西城区新街口东街59号。
messages.content: After confirmation, they provide foreign guests reception and the address is No 59, Xinjiekou East Street, Xicheng District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京西城区新街口东街59号
dialog_act: No 59, Xinjiekou East Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 好的，外宾到了以后想要去一个评分4.5分以上，能游玩2小时 - 3小时的免费景点参观，有合适的景点吗？
messages.content: Okay. After arriving, the foreigner wants to go to a free attraction with a playing duration of 2 hours-3 hours and a rating of 4.5 points or above , do you have any suitable attractions to recommend?

messages.ori_content: 有几个合适的景点，北京自然博物馆、首都博物馆、广济寺等等。
messages.content: There are several suitable attractions, Beijing Museum of Natural History, Capital Museum, Guangji Temple, etc.

messages.ori_content: 北京自然博物馆周边有酒店吗？
messages.content: Are there any hotels around Beijing Museum of Natural History?

messages.ori_content: 北京自然博物馆附近有酒店北京首都宾馆、北京贵都大酒店、北京天伦王朝酒店。
messages.content: There are several hotels around Beijing Museum of Natural History, including Capital Hotel Beijing, Guidu Beijing and Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing.

messages.ori_content: 外国友人想吃手撕鸡，我应该带他到哪里能吃到？
messages.content: My foreign friend wants to enjoy poached sliced chicken, which restaurant should I take him to?

messages.ori_content: 可以去好多餐馆，其中有字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)、长城酒家(亮马桥店)、外婆家江鱼馆等等。
messages.content: There are many restaurants for your reference, such as ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao), The Great-wall Restaurant (Liangmaqiao), Grandma's Fish Restaurant, etc.
ori_dialog_act: 字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)
dialog_act: ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao)

messages.ori_content: 字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)的电话给我下，周边还有其他餐馆吗？
messages.content: Please give me the telephone number of ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao), and are there any other restaurants around it?
ori_dialog_act: 字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)
dialog_act: ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao)

messages.ori_content: 字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)的电话是01065305799、01065305899，周边还有几家餐馆，那家小馆(永安里店)、老书虫、分米鸡。
messages.content: The telephone numbers of ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao) are 01065305799 and 01065305899. And there are several restaurants around it,including Najia Restaurant (Yong'anli), The Bookworm and DM Chicken.
ori_dialog_act: 字里行间蔬食营养餐厅(华贸店)
dialog_act: ZiLi HangJian Vegetable and Nutrition Restaurant (HuaMao)

messages.ori_content: 在上面的这些餐馆里，有卖乳瓜沾酱的吗，想吃这个，最好评分5分。
messages.content: Among those restaurants, is there a restaurant with small cucumber and soy bean sauce and a rating of 5 points? I want to taste small cucumber and soy bean sauce.
dialog_act: Small cucumber and soy bean sauce

messages.ori_content: 没有卖乳瓜沾酱的，推荐您去老书虫吧，他家的卡布奇诺、提拉米苏、美式咖啡特别棒，评分4.8分。
messages.content: There isn't a restaurant with small cucumber and soy bean sauce. And I recommend you go to The Bookworm. The cappuccino, tiramisu and americano of it are great, and the rating is 4.8 points.

messages.ori_content: 他家人均多少钱？
messages.content: What's the per-person price of the restaurant?

messages.ori_content: 人均59元。
messages.content: Its per-person cost is 59 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 好的，谢谢了。
messages.content: Ok, thanks.

messages.ori_content: 不客气。
messages.content: You're welcome.

messages.ori_content: 非常感谢！
messages.content: Thank you very much!

messages.ori_content: 不用谢。
messages.content: You are welcome.

task description: 你要去一个景点(id=1)游玩。你希望游玩的时长是1小时 - 2小时。你希望景点的票价是免费的。你想知道这个景点的名称、电话、周边景点。

messages.ori_content: 前门大街，潘家园和北大红楼都是不错的地方，你看看哪个是你的菜。
messages.content: Qianmen Street, Panjiayuan Market and Peking University's Red Building are good attractions.Which one do you like best?

messages.content: Qianmen Street is more suitable for me as I like shopping, haha, what is the telephone number of this attraction?
The telephone number is 010-67060009.

messages.ori_content: 好的，前门大街周边都有哪些其他景点呢？
messages.content: Okay, Are there any other attractions around Qianmen Street?

messages.ori_content: 故宫  天坛  恭王府 天安门广场 北海公园都是它周边的景点。
messages.content: There are The Forbidden City, Temple of Heaven Prince, Kung ’s Mansion, The Tiananmen Square and Beihai Park.

messages.content: That's perfect, I want to go to the attractions near Qianmen Street, could you recommend me an attraction with the price of 200 yuan or above?

messages.ori_content: 没有这样的景点呢，最贵的就是故宫了，门票也才60元，你看行吗？
messages.content: There is no such attraction, the most expensive one is The Forbidden City, and the ticket is only 60 yuan. Is it OK?

messages.ori_content: OK，你知道故宫周边都有什么餐馆吗？

messages.ori_content: 真是太多了，例如北京全聚德(王府井店), 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）, 姚记炒肝店（鼓楼店）。
messages.content: There are too many restaurants, such as Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing), Huguosi Snack (headquater) and Yao Ji Fried Liver Restaurant (Gulou).
ori_dialog_act: 护国寺小吃店（护国寺总店）

messages.ori_content: 这么多餐馆呀，我都馋了，那故宫周边还有哪些其他景点呢？

messages.ori_content: 有天安门广场, 恭王府, 天坛, 中国国家博物馆。
messages.content: There are The Tiananmen Square, Prince Kung's mansion, Temple of heaven and National Museum of China.

messages.ori_content: 真是不错的地方呢，游玩之后我想找一个最低价格900-1000元，评分4.5分以上的酒店住宿，能给推荐一个不？

messages.ori_content: 包含。
messages.content: Contain it.

dialog_act: Hotel Facilities - WiFi in Some Rooms

messages.ori_content: 好的，可以把酒店地址发给我吗？
messages.content: Okay, could you send me the hotel address?

messages.ori_content: 北京东城区祈年大街8号。
messages.content: The hotel address is No. 8, Qinian Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing.
ori_dialog_act: 北京东城区祈年大街8号
dialog_act: No.8, Qinian Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

messages.ori_content: 我打算乘地铁从前门大街到北京新世界酒店，你知道出发地和目的地附近地铁站都是什么吗？

messages.content: The subway station near the departure is Chongwenmen Subway Station Exit A1, and the subway station near the destination is Chongwenmen Subway Station, Exit D.

messages.ori_content: 嗯呢，不用客气！
messages.content: Well, you ’re welcome!

你要去一个景点(id=2)游玩。你希望景点的票价是150-200元的。你想知道这个景点的名称、周边餐馆。
你要去id=2附近的餐馆(id=3)用餐。你希望餐馆的评分是4.5分以上。你希望餐馆的人均消费是100-150元的。你想知道这个餐馆的营业时间。
你要去一个酒店(id=4)住宿。你希望酒店提供租车。你希望酒店提供24小时热水。你希望酒店的评分是5分。你希望酒店是高档型的。你想知道这个酒店的名称、周边景点、价格。
你要去id=4附近的景点(id=5)游玩。你希望景点的评分是4分以上。你想知道这个景点的游玩时间、周边景点。

messages.ori_content: 您好，我和朋友要去大德祥老北京炸酱面大王(兴隆街店)吃饭，帮我看看这家餐馆周边还有什么餐馆？
messages.content: Hello, my friend and I are going to have a meal at Dadexiang Traditional Beijing Noodles with Soy Bean Paste (Xinglong Street), could you recommend me any restaurants around it?
ori_dialog_act: 大德祥老北京炸酱面大王(兴隆街店)
dialog_act: Dadexiang Traditional Beijing Noodles with Soy Bean Paste (Xinglong Street)

messages.ori_content: 周边餐馆有北京全聚德、北京全聚德(王府井店)、 姚记炒肝店（鼓楼店）等等。
messages.content: There are Zhouyuan Restaurant Beijing Quanjude, Beijing Quanjude (Wangfujing), Yao Ji Fried Liver Restaurant (Gulou), etc.

messages.ori_content: 周末要带孩子去放松一下，想找一个票价是150-200元的景点，求推荐。
messages.content: I want to take my kids to relax on the weekend, could you recommend me an attraction with the price of 150-200 yuan?

messages.ori_content: 北京欢乐谷、	北京海洋馆都是不错的选择呢。
messages.content: Beijing Happy Valley and Beijing Aquarium are good choices.

messages.ori_content: 就去北京欢乐谷吧，周边有什么餐馆吗？
messages.content: I prefer Beijing Happy Valley , are there any restaurants around it?

messages.ori_content: 周边餐馆有全聚德烤鸭(吕营店)、一碗居老北京炸酱面(蒲芳路店)等好多呢。
messages.content: The surrounding restaurants include Quanjude Roast Duck (Lvying), Yiwanju Traditional Beijing Noodles with Soy Bean Paste (Pufang Road), etc.

messages.ori_content: 那周边的餐馆中我想找一家评分是4.5分以上、人均消费是100-150元的，有吗？
messages.content: Well I want to find a restaurant with a rating of 4.5 points or above and a per-person cost of 100-150 yuan. Are there any restaurants around it?

messages.ori_content: 有啊，推荐您去京味斋烤鸭店(劲松店)，菜品很多呢，评分5分，人均消费104元。
messages.content: Yes, I recommend you go to the Jingweizhai Roast Duck Restaurant (Jinsong). There are many dishes, and it has the rating of 5 points and a per-person cost of 104 yuan.

messages.ori_content: 这家的营业时间是几点？
messages.content: What is the opening time of the restaurant?
It opens at 10: 30-21: 30 from Monday to Sunday and it doesn't open at 00: 00-04: 00 from January 26, 2018 to January 26, 2018.
dialog_act: Monday to Sunday 10: 30-21: 30 Non-business hours 2018-01-26 to 2018-01-26 00: 00-04: 00

messages.ori_content: 我们准备在外面住一夜，帮我推荐一家提供租车、提供24小时热水、评分是5分的酒店吧。
messages.content: We are going to spend the night outside and I want to find a hotel with the sercvice of car rental, 24-hour hot water and the rating of 5 points, could you recommend one?

messages.ori_content: 推荐您去北京天伦王朝酒店，非常不错呢。
messages.content: I recommend you go to the Sunworld Dynasty Hotel Beijing Wangfujing as it is a very good choice.

messages.ori_content: 这家酒店是高档型的吗？
messages.content: Is this a high-end hotel?

messages.ori_content: 是的呢，是一家高档型的酒店。
messages.content: Yes, it is a high-end hotel.

messages.ori_content: 那挺好，价格高不？周边有景点没？
messages.content: That's good. Is the price of the hotel high? Are there any attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 价格是815元；周边景点有故宫、天安门广场、 天坛等等。
messages.content: The price is 815 yuan; and the surrounding attractions include The Forbidden City, The Tiananmen Square, Temple of Heaven, etc.

messages.ori_content: 孩子还没尽兴，这些景点中哪家是评分4分以上的呢？能玩多久呢？周边还有景点没？
messages.content: The children have not enjoyed themselves yet. Among these attractions, which one has the rating of 4 points or above? How long can we stay there? Are there any other attractions around it?

messages.ori_content: 您可以带孩子去中国国家博物馆哟，评分4.7分，门票免费，能玩3个小时呢。而且周边景点还很多，有故宫、天坛、天安门广场等。
messages.content: You can take your children to the National Museum of China, the rating of which is 4.7. The ticket of it is free, and you can play for 3 hours. There are also many attractions around it, including the Forbidden City, Temple of Heaven and Tiananmen Square.

messages.ori_content: 好的，没有问题了，谢了。
messages.content: Ok, I have no any other questions, thanks.

messages.ori_content: 不客气！祝您生活愉快！再见！
messages.content: You're welcome! Have a good time! Goodbye!
